she turned into a demon. That’s how man-eating demons
multiply.

for the mountain.

back into a human!
I swear I’ll heal her!

human.

text:
I’ll find a way, no matter what! So, please… don’t
kill her!

Tanjirou is leaving

text: I’ll hunt down the one who slaughtered my family!

Tanjirou is leaving

text: Please… don’t kill my younger sister! Please don’t do it.

The next morning.

text:

be dead!
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Can a weakling who can’t take the initiative in such a situation heal his sister?!
Hunt down the enemy?!

scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: The weak have no rights or choices!
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Their only fate is to be relentlessly crushed
by the strong! The demons might know how to cure your sister!
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
But don’t
think that a demon would respect your will or wishes!
Naturally, I have no respect for you, either!

scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving

text:

earlier? Was that your way of protecting her?
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Why didn’t
you swing your hatchet? Why did you show your back to me?
All those blunders led to your sister’s capture!
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
I could have skewered
her along with you!
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:

speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
Your family was massacred, and your sister’s
become a demon. (Thoughts) I know it’s painful. I
know you want to scream. I get it.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:
If only I’d gotten here a half-day
sooner, your family
might not have ended up dead.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text: But there’s no way to turn back time.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:

The powerful, pure rage of not being able to forgive will become your answering drive to take
action!
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
The next morning.
Tanjirou is leaving
for the mountain.

text:

like yours, you can’t protect
your sister or heal her, or get revenge for your family!

even its own parents or siblings because they’re nutrient-rich.

out my defects.

wakes up.

See, Total Concentration Breathing
accelerates your blood circulation and your heart rate.

That causes your body temperature to spike, making

wakes up.

and muscles scurry to heat up and grow stronger.

The reason I won… was because I learned
to detect the scent of the opening thread.
speaker: Tanjirou

text:
When I’m battling
someone and I pick up this scent,
then I can see the thread.
speaker: Tanjirou

text:

growing taut the instant I see it.
speaker: Tanjirou

text:
My blade is drawn toward
it with great force, and then I slash the opening.

text:
Urokodaki        Make sure you come back alive
from the Final
Selection.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest. Tanjirou
has cut the boulder in half successfully. Urokodaki walks toward
him.

text:
Both your sister and I will be waiting
for you here.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest. Tanjirou
has cut the boulder in half successfully. Urokodaki walks toward

text:
Wow… What’s the occasion?
There’s so much.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

text: Urokodaki        You’ve completed all your training, so we’re celebrating.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

speaker: Tanjirou

more I can do for you.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

text:
From here on out, you’ll
be going through
such hardship and strife. Your training will seem like nothing in
comparison.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

text:
So for now, at least,
you should rest well without
a care in the world.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

speaker: Tanjirou

scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

text:
Yes! I haven’t had such a feast in so
long!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

text:
Urokodaki        A growing
boy like you with a hearty appetite
should get stronger
the more he eats, as well as grow bigger in size.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

text: But that goes for demons, too.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

text:
Remember this. Basically, a demon is as strong
as the number of humans
he’s devoured.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

text:
So, the more they eat, the stronger they
get?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

text:
Urokodaki        That’s right.
There are demons
who gain power,
become able to transform their bodies,
and even use strange spells.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

text:
Urokodaki        When your sense of smell
becomes keener, you’ll be able to tell how many humans a
demon has consumed.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Urokodaki’s hut. Urokodaki is preparing dinner.

speaker: Tanjirou

text:
I’ve charged it with a spell to protect
you from harm.

wisteria flowers. Even though they’re
out of season…

Everyone. We thank you for coming
here tonight to the Demon
Slayers Corps Final Selection.

Tanjirou walks on a path through wisteria

text:
There are demons imprisoned here on Mt. Fujikasane, captured
alive by the Demon
Slayer swordsmen, and unable to leave.
speaker: Kanata
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou walks on a path through wisteria

text:
That is because wisteria, which demons hate so much, blooms year-round from the bottom to
halfway up the mountain.
speaker: Kiriya
scene:
At night.
Tanjirou walks on a path through wisteria
flowers.

text:
However, there is no wisteria from this point
on, and so demons abound.
speaker: Kanata

At night.
Tanjirou walks on a path through wisteria

text:
You need to survive
here for seven days to pass the Final Selection.
speaker: Kiriya

At night.
Tanjirou walks on a path through wisteria

First, I’m going to survive

then.

text: So I’ll have to head east!

I’m gonna make my way to where the sunlight

Where is it? Where is it coming

A demon and a female human!
(Thoughts) They’re nowhere to be seen.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In a house elsewhere in the town.

text: But… the spot where the scent is strongest… is right here!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In a house elsewhere in the town.

speaker: Tanjirou

text:
Urokodaki        (Flashback) The demons who use special
spells called the “Blood Demon
Art” possess supernatural
abilities.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In a house elsewhere in the town.

text:
You may have to fight those demons,
as well, from now on.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In a house elsewhere in the town.

text:
Where are those girls
you kidnapped?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In a house elsewhere in the town.

text: I’ve got two more questions for you!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In a house elsewhere in the town.

speaker: Kazumi
scene: In a house elsewhere in the town.

text:
Mr. Kazumi, please hold this person
and stand nearby.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In a house elsewhere in the town.

text:
If you’re inside my range of attack, I can protect
you!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In a house elsewhere in the town.

text:
From the ground or this wall… It can probably
emerge from anywhere.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In a house elsewhere in the town.

text: There’s also the chance that it could show up out of thin air. (Thoughts) But this demon… even when it’s submerged, it can’t erase its scent! (Thoughts) Here it comes!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In a house elsewhere in the town.

scene:
In a flashback. Tanjirou

text:
The type of demon with the blood that can turn humans into demons… There is only one
in this world.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In a flashback. Tanjirou
and Urokodaki talk.

text:
Urokodaki        The
one who was the first
to become a demon more than a thousand years
ago.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In a flashback. Tanjirou
and Urokodaki talk.

text: In other words, that is your family’s foe.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In a flashback. Tanjirou
and Urokodaki talk.

text:
Moreover, I believe he’s the one who might know how to turn your sister
back into a human.

and Urokodaki talk.

dispersed into three.

text:

slashing those three
demons! (Thoughts) Don’t lose your nerve!

in the mansion.

in the mansion.

In the present,

in the mansion.

Any time spent on you is wasted. (Flashback) Sensei is an
extraordinary man.

admonishes Zenitsu.

way!
speaker: Kaigaku
scene:
In Zenitsu’s
subconscious, in a dream. Kaigaku
admonishes Zenitsu.

text:
Sensei is a former Hashira!
Someone who earned
the highest title in the Demon Slayer Corps!
speaker: Kaigaku
scene:
In Zenitsu’s
subconscious, in a dream. Kaigaku
admonishes Zenitsu.

text:
Almost
no one ever gets the chance to be trained
by a former Hashira! The time Sensei spends training you is
all for nothing!
speaker: Kaigaku
scene:
In Zenitsu’s
subconscious, in a dream. Kaigaku
admonishes Zenitsu.

text: You’re an eyesore, okay?! Get out of my sight! (Flashback) Why are you here? Why do you insist on clinging here?!
speaker: Kaigaku
scene:
In Zenitsu’s
subconscious, in a dream. Kaigaku
admonishes Zenitsu.

text:
I have
no parents, so no one has any hopes for me. There’s
no one who dreams that I’ll grasp or accomplish something one day.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the present.
Zenitsu recounts his time with Kuwajima.

text:
That I’ll prove
myself useful to somebody. That I’ll manage
to protect somebody and make
that person happy, just once in my life.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the present.
Zenitsu recounts his time with Kuwajima.

text:
Not even a simple future
like that. There’s
no one who hopes that I’ll have one.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the present.
Zenitsu recounts his time with Kuwajima.

text:
If you fail, cry,
and run away even once, they say, “Oh, this guy’s no good,”
and they walk away.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the present.
Zenitsu recounts his time with Kuwajima.

text:
But not Gramps!
Time and time again, he steadfastly reprimanded me.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the present.
Zenitsu recounts his time with Kuwajima.

text:
All those times I kept running away… Time and time again… he’d drag me
back. Clearly, he did smack me around a bit too much. But he never abandoned
me.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the present.
Zenitsu recounts his time with Kuwajima.

Zenitsu recounts his time with Kuwajima.

him!

text:

me, Mr. Urokodaki, Mr. Haganezuka! Thanks to my inexperience, my sword is now broken!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: No, this isn’t the time for that! Think! Think!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
If I can’t slash those
threads, then let me get right up in his face!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
It’s no good! Those threads
have a life of their own, and I can’t get through their attacks!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: Even though he’s holding back enough not to kill me, he’s still overwhelming me to this degree!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: Well? Do you still refuse to take back what you said?
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: Fine. In that case, you’ll get slashed to ribbons.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
Nezuko! Nezuko! You protected
me! I’m sorry!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
A girl emerged from that box on his shoulders. But she has the aura of a
demon!
speaker: Sister
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

speaker: Sister
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
Hey, you… Is that… That girl…
Is she your sibling?
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: The wound is so deep! Her left wrist is about to fall off!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

speaker: Nezuko
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
Hurry up and heal! Hurry
up and heal! Hurry up and heal!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: Siblings… Siblings… The sister’s been turned into a demon.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

speaker: Sister
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: Yet, she stays by his side.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
The younger
sister protected the elder brother.
Risking her own life…
That’s a genuine bond! I want it!
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
W-Wait a minute! Wait a minute!
Please! I’m your elder sister!
Don’t desert me!
speaker: Sister
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

speaker: Sister
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
None of you ever managed to fulfill the roles you were given.
Never. Not once.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
W-Wait. I was the elder sister
you wanted, wasn’t I? Give me a chance to redeem myself!
speaker: Sister
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
In that case,
go kill those people wandering
all over this mountain. If you do that, I’ll forgive you for what just happened.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

speaker: Sister
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: Boy, let’s talk. Come on out.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
The thing is, I was really
moved.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
Seeing the bond you two share gave me chills.
I doubt there are any words in this
universe that can describe how moved I was.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
But now the only thing left for you is death by my hand.
It would be sad if it were to come to pass, right?
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
But there’s
just one thing. Just one thing that will let you escape
that.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
Your sister…
Give your sister
to me. If you hand her over without
a fight, I’ll at least
spare your life.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: I have no idea what you’re talking about!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
Your little
sister will be my little sister. Starting
today.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: You didn’t actually think I’d ever agree to that.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
Not to mention,
Nezuko’s not a thing! She has her own feelings
and will! There’s no way
she’ll ever be your sister!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
It’s all right. No need to worry. Because
I’ll create a bond between
us.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
I’m stronger
than you. I’m talking about the bond of terror.
I’ll teach her what
will happen if she defies me.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: I’ve had enough of this crazy talk!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
Using terror
to shackle someone
hand and foot is
not the bond of
a family! Unless you fix that basic misunderstanding, you’ll
never get what you desire!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: So irritating. Would you mind not shouting?
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: We don’t see eye to eye, do we?
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: I’ll never hand Nezuko over to you!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
That’s okay, I guess.
I’ll just kill you and then take
her.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: I’ll cut off your head first!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text: That’s the spirit! I’d like to see you try it.
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

text:
That is, if you can actually
defeat a member
of the Twelve Kizuki like me!
speaker: Rui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou prepares
to fight Rui with his broken sword.

speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
A father has his role as the father,
and the mother has her role as the mother.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
The parents
protect the children, and the elder brother and sister protect
their younger siblings.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: No matter what. At the risk of their own lives.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
The way I
see it, if you don’t understand your own role, there’s no reason for you to live.
What about you? What is your role?
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
Your role is to relinquish your younger sister
to me and disappear. If you
can’t do that, your only
option is to die.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: Lower Five… Just as I thought! That power… This kid is a true Twelve Kizuki!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
It won’t
be easy to slash those threads. What should I do? With this broken
sword… If that kid’s neck turns out to be tougher than the threads…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: I don’t like that look in your eyes. Glittering like that…
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
What a fool you are. Don’t
tell me… you think you’re
going to beat me?
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: All right, I’ve taken her now. Now do you recognize what your own role is?
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: But I told you I’d spare your life at least if you didn’t defy me.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
Stop that hollering. I’m sure that’s
not enough to kill her. After all, she’s a demon.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
But it looks like I’ll have to teach her a lesson after all. I’m going to let her bleed for a
while.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
If she doesn’t
learn to be docile, I’ll just leave her like that until daybreak… and let
her roast for a bit.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: You let Nezuko… Let her go!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: Look, you… I’m sure I’m mistaken, but…
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
… you don’t think
that if you get close enough to me, you can chop off my head, do you?
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: Fine by me. Here. Give it a shot.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
The blade… won’t
go through! Ngh… Ngh…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
Didn’t I tell you? You have no chance
against me.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
My body is more durable than any thread
I manipulate.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
If you can’t even slash those
threads, you don’t
have a chance in hell of slashing
my neck.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: S-So powerful. His power is on a whole different level than any other demon I’ve fought!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
So this is a Twelve
Kizuki’s… The power of a demon closely
related to Kibutsuji?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
You’re making
too much noise. Quiet down a bit.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
I’m your elder brother
now. Enough of that infernal
wailing.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: Calm down! Don’t get emotional! If you keep this up, you’ll be playing right into his hands!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: Hm? Did she pass out? Is she asleep?
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
This demon has a unique aura.
There’s something about her that’s not like the rest of us. Interesting.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
Concentrate! Control your breathing! Unleash the most precise, final Form!
(Thoughts) Total Concentration!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
You still don’t realize
how futile it is?
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
Water Breathing! Tenth
Form! Constant Flux!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
I slashed them!
I was able to slash the threads!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
Gathering
force with each rotation… This could be trouble.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
I can do it! If I can keep closing
the distance between
us, I can defeat him!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
Hey… You don’t think these threads
are at maximum strength, do you?
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
Blood Demon
Art… Cutting Thread
Cage. I have no more use for you. Goodbye.
speaker: Rui
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text: No good! I can’t slash these threads!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
I’m still not getting enough
spin. These are giving off a totally
different scent than the
other threads!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

text:
But I can’t
afford to lose, no matter
what! (Thoughts) I’m gonna die. I’m gonna lose! I’m…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the forest
of Mt. Natagumo. Tanjirou and Rui face each other.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the past, in Tanjirou’s memory. A young Tanjirou and Nezuko dance and play as their father
Tanjuurou watches them.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the past, in Tanjirou’s memory. A young Tanjirou and Nezuko dance and play as their father
Tanjuurou watches them.

text:
Tanjuurou        Tanjirou… Breathe. Get your breathing under
control and become
Hinokami.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the past, in Tanjirou’s memory. A young Tanjirou and Nezuko dance and play as their father
Tanjuurou watches them.

text:
Tanjirou? Look. It’s your father’s kagura
dance.
speaker: Kie
scene:
In another
memory. A baby Tanjirou watches
Tanjuurou perform a dance.

text:
Our family
works with fire, so to ward off injuries and disasters, we offer this dance to Hinokami, along with our prayers, on
New Year’s Day.
speaker: Kie
scene:
In another
memory. A baby Tanjirou watches
Tanjuurou perform a dance.

speaker: Kie
scene:
In another
memory. A baby Tanjirou watches
Tanjuurou perform a dance.

speaker: Kie
scene:
In another
memory. A baby Tanjirou watches
Tanjuurou perform a dance.

text:
Y.Tanjirou        How
can Father dance like that in the snow for so long when he’s so frail?
speaker: Kie
scene:
In another
memory. A baby Tanjirou watches
Tanjuurou perform a dance.

text: I bet my lungs would freeze.
speaker: Kie
scene:
In another
memory. A baby Tanjirou watches
Tanjuurou perform a dance.

text:
Tanjuurou        There’s a breathing technique. A way to breathe so that you won’t exhaust
yourself, no matter how much
you move.
speaker: Kie
scene:
In another
memory. Tanjuurou sits in bed as Tanjirou
listens.

speaker: Kie
scene:
In another
memory. Tanjuurou sits in bed as Tanjirou
listens.

text:
Tanjuurou        Right. If you can master the correct way to breathe,
you’ll be able to dance forever, too.
speaker: Kie
scene:
In another
memory. Tanjuurou sits in bed as Tanjirou
listens.

text:
The cold won’t bother
you, either.
speaker: Kie
scene:
In another
memory. Tanjuurou sits in bed as Tanjirou
listens.

text:
Tanjirou, if nothing else, make sure this kagura and these earrings get passed down to you
uninterrupted.
speaker: Kie
scene:
In another
memory. Tanjuurou sits in bed as Tanjirou
listens.

speaker: Kie
scene:
In another
memory. Tanjuurou sits in bed as Tanjirou
listens.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath.

speaker: Rui
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath.

text:
If you stop now, it’ll
bring on the repercussions of forcibly switching
from Water Breathing to Hinokami Dance Breathing!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath.

text:
When that happens,
I’ll be immobile for a while!
(Thoughts) That’s why I gotta do it now!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath.

speaker: Rui
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath.

speaker: Rui
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath.

text:
You gotta take him down now! Even if it means… getting
slashed by him at
the same time!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the present. Tanjirou
takes a deep breath.

speaker: Kie
scene:
In Nezuko’s
subconscious. Kie calls out to Nezuko.

text:
You have to save your brother.
I know you can do it now, Nezuko.
speaker: Kie
scene:
In Nezuko’s
subconscious. Kie calls out to Nezuko.

pretend to be your family?

text:
Just as you’ve all reported, the demons’ carnage
has increased more than ever.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
The threat to human
life is greater
than it’s ever been.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
We’ll have to bolster
the ranks of the Demon
Slayers. What do you all think?
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
Shinazugawa    The incident on Mt. Natagumo
made it crystal clear.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
The caliber
of Demon Slayers
has nose-dived to unbelievable levels.
Most of them are
useless.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
You’d think they could at least
tell if someone’s competent or not.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
Well, that kid today
sure seemed competent.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text: He did land that flamboyant blow on you, Shinazugawa. He’s got potential.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

speaker: Uzui
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
The more the human
population increases, the harder it becomes to control and unify
them.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
Not to mention that the times have changed
considerably in this era.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
Other than those who’ve had their loved ones brutally massacred
and joined the Corps,
or those of distinguished pedigree who have hunted demons for generations, to
ask anyone to harness as much or even greater resolve and drive to produce results would be cruel.
speaker: Himejima
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
Still,
considering that boy ran into a Twelve Kizuki so soon after joining the Corps… He may have the power to draw them! Even
we rarely get the chance to confront one! It makes me envious!
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
Agreed. But the fact that Lower
Five made such a drastic
move probably means that
Muzan is nowhere near Mt. Natagumo.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
After all, as in the case of Asakusa,
whenever Muzan wishes
to hide something, he creates a clever diversion to throw us off.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
But those demons are still freely
devouring humans, gaining
strength and surviving. For the sake of those who have died, there is only one thing for
us to do.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
I believe that among you Hashiras who are present
today, I’ve assembled
the finest unit since the First Breathing swordsmen
of the feudal era.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text:
Tengen Uzui,
Kyoujurou Rengoku, Shinobu Kochou, Mitsuri Kanroji, Muichirou Tokitou, Gyoumei Himejima,
Sanemi Shinazugawa, Obanai Iguro, Giyuu Tomioka… My children,
I look forward to your success.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
In a room in the Demon Slayer
Corps Headquarters. The Hashiras are gathered with Kagaya.

text: Muzan Kibutsuji, I swear I’ll defeat you if it’s the last thing I do.
speaker: Kagaya

text:
We will bring you down without
fail.
speaker: Kagaya

Manor.

text:
Even though your friends
went off somewhere…
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
Don’t you feel lonely
all by yourself?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text: No! Because once I’ve mastered it myself, I can teach them, too!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
You have a beautiful
soul, don’t you?
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text: Um… Why did you bring us all here?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
Nezuko’s existence
has been officially acknowledged, and the three of you were injured
so seriously.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
And also, I’d like to entrust
my dream to you.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
My dream
that we can become friends
with the demons.
I’m quite sure you can accomplish that.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
For some reason, I’m always picking
up an angry scent from you even though you’re always smiling.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
Yes… You’re right. It might be true that I’m in a constant
state of anger.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
Ever since my
beloved older sister was slaughtered by a demon, every time I see the tears of those who’ve lost their
loved ones to a demon,
every time I hear those cries of despair… the anger keeps building up
inside me and continues to swell.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
Deep down in the innermost depths
of my body, there’s a revulsion that I can’t fight. I’m sure the other Hashiras feel something similar, as well.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
Well, this time,
they saw Nezuko, who’s never devoured a human, with their own eyes, and they’ve
memorized her presence. Out of respect
for the Master’s
wishes, I don’t think
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text: anyone will raise a hand to her.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
My older
sister was a kind-hearted person like you. She had sympathy for demons. Even when she was on the brink of death,
she still felt pity for them.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
I couldn’t
bring myself to feel that way. How can you feel sorry
for something that’s
killed humans? I’ve never heard of anything so absurd.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
But if that was
how my sister truly felt, then I must carry it on. If there’s a way not to kill
these pitiful demons, I have to keep trying to come up with it… without ever extinguishing
the smile that my sister said she loved.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
Sister…
Sister! Sister!! But now, I’m
a bit exhausted.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
Demons do nothing but lie. Losing
all reason out of self-preservation, they murder humans
with their instincts laid totally bare.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text: Tanjirou, please do all that you can. Please find a way to protect Nezuko until the end.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
Knowing that you’re working
so hard in my place reassures me to no end. I can rest easy now.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

text:
Your Total Concentration Breathing
has come to a halt.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly
Manor.

15 days later, at night. Tanjirou

text:
Mother,
Hanako… Takeo, Shigeru,
Rokuta… Ngh…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
15 days later, at night. Tanjirou
sits on the roof of the Butterfly

text:
I’m going to turn Nezuko
back into a human for sure!

more! Thanks, all of
you!

gone off to train. Jeez, it’s the crack of dawn.

are asleep.

text:
Putting in effort isn’t my thing. There’s
nothing more draining
than persevering every day.
speaker: Zenitsu

Zenitsu and Inosuke
are asleep.

speaker: Zenitsu
scene:

Maybe getting
left behind by Tanjirou is making me panic, but I can’t
get the hang of anything
even if he shows me for hours.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
A new day, in the morning.
Zenitsu and Inosuke
are asleep.

text: Now I realize that we’re a total lost cause.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
A new day, in the morning.
Zenitsu and Inosuke
are asleep.

text:
Wait, did you just say, “Yes,
you are”? How can you be so cruel? Would it kill you to say
just once, “You’re working hard, too”?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
A new day, in the morning.
Zenitsu and Inosuke
are asleep.

text:
Did you just say, “Work harder”?
Haa… I guess there’s no way out of
it.

A new day, in the morning.
Zenitsu and Inosuke
are asleep.

text:
What Tanjirou is trying to master
is a skill called “Total
Concentration, Constant”.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the Butterfly
Manor. Zenitsu and Inosuke speak
with Shinobu.

text:
By continuing to do Total Concentration Breathing
every second of the day, your
basic stamina level will skyrocket.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the Butterfly
Manor. Zenitsu and Inosuke speak
with Shinobu.

speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the Butterfly
Manor. Zenitsu and Inosuke speak

text: Heh… Let’s just go ahead and try it!
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the Butterfly
Manor. Zenitsu and Inosuke speak
with Shinobu.

speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In the Butterfly
Manor. Zenitsu and Inosuke speak

Manor. Zenitsu and Inosuke speak

text:
I still
can’t sustain Total Concentration Breathing all day unless
I really throw myself into it, but I bet you two can do it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text:
You just go
like this to make your lungs expand!
When that rattles
your blood, your bones
and muscles will go “Boom, boom”, and you gotta stop it!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

speaker: Tanjirou

text:
All that’s left to do is train like
crazy!

scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

speaker: Tanjirou

text:
Now, now. We’re talking
about a basic skill, or should I say a beginner skill,
so why wouldn’t you be able
to do it? But it’s also true that one must put great effort into mastering it,
right?
speaker: Shinobu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text: Well, why wouldn’t you be able to do it, though?
speaker: Shinobu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text:
I
was sure it would be child’s
play for you, Inosuke. Are you sure you can’t do it? Even
though there’s no reason you can’t do it?
speaker: Shinobu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text:
It can’t be helped, then, if you can’t do it.
Can’t be helped, can’t be helped.
speaker: Shinobu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text:
Huh?! I can do it,
all right! Why wouldn’t I?! Don’t mess with me, or I swear I’ll rip off your
breasts!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

speaker: Zenitsu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

text:
Please give it your all, Zenitsu!
I’m your biggest
cheerleader!

speaker: Zenitsu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu and Inosuke sit with Tanjirou.

so why don’t you join them?

It hurts… I’m hungry… I’m sad… I feel hopeless…
I’m in agony… I’m lonely…
speaker: Y.Kanao

is beaten by her father.

That was my life. But then,
one day, I heard a sound like a snap… and I never
knew pain again.

is beaten by her father.

While living in poverty, even when my parents sold me,
it didn’t make me feel
sad.

owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

one.

In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text: Happy now? Get away from her.

scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

scene:
In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

text: Ahh, are you sure about this?

In the past. Kanao’s
owner leads her with a rope tied around her waist.

In the past. Kanao’s

text: Sister! Sister! Sister, this child is hopeless!

text:
She can’t
do anything without
being told! That goes for meals, as well! She won’t touch her food unless I tell her to eat!
Even as her stomach growls and growls!

manor. Shinobu cleans

plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
P-Please forgive us! Since
you’ve assumed a different form and aura…
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text: Kibutsuji          Who gave you permission to speak?
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Kibutsuji          Don’t presume to voice your worthless
thoughts. Answer my questions. Nothing
else.
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text: Rui was killed. I’m talking about Lower Five.
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
I have but one question
to ask of you. Why is it that you demons in the Lower Ranks are so utterly weak?
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
You shouldn’t be
satisfied with just being counted among the Twelve Kizuki. That is merely your starting point.
To devour more humans, to gain more power… Your starting
point for becoming useful to me…
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
For over a
century, the members of the Upper Rank Twelve Kizuki have remained unchanged. It’s always been the demons
in the Upper Ranks who’ve
disposed of those Hashira Demon Slayers. But what
about you demons in the Lower Ranks? How many times have you been replaced?
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text: Kamanue         (Thoughts) That’s easy for you to say, but we…
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Kibutsuji          “That’s easy for you to say, but
we”…
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text: What? Go ahead and say it.
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text: Kamanue         (Thoughts) He can read my mind? I’m screwed!
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Kibutsuji          Screwed how? Go ahead
and say it.
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Kamanue         Please forgive me, Master
Kibutsuji!
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
I’m truly sorry! I’m truly sorry!
I’m truly – Ah… Ahh!
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Am I going to be killed?
After all I went through
to become a Twelve Kizuki… Why? Why?
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text: I thought I was going to do more and more!
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Kibutsuji          Are you more afraid
of the Demon Slayers than you are of me?
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Kibutsuji          Every time you run into a Demon Slayer
Hashira, the only thing on your mind is escape.
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text: Oh no, that’s not what I’m thinking! I’ll put my own life on the line to fight for you!
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text: Kibutsuji          Are you refuting what I just said?
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Our minds are being read. Whether we agree or disagree with him,
he’s still going to kill us!
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
We can’t possibly
beat him in battle, either!
In that case…
speaker: Mukago
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

speaker: Rokuro
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text: Wakuraba        (Thoughts) … the only option is to run!
speaker: Rokuro
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Wakuraba        (Thoughts) Just make it out of here somehow!
Somehow! Now that I’ve gotten
this far away…
speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Kibutsuji          I
believe that the Twelve Kizuki
are better off consisting of just the Upper Ranks.
I am now dismantling the Lower Ranks.
speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
No way… Was it that Biwa Player’s
technique? No, I didn’t hear any biwa sounds.
speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text: Guh… Why? I can’t regenerate my body.
speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text: Kibutsuji          Do you have any last words?
speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
I
can still be of use to you! If you could give me just a
short reprieve, I swear I’ll be of use
to you!
speaker: Rokuro
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Kibutsuji          How long a reprieve
are you asking for, specifically? How do you intend to be useful?
speaker: Rokuro
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
What exactly can you accomplish with your current
skills?
speaker: Rokuro
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

speaker: Rokuro
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
If you could give me a share of your
blood, I will acclimate
without fail! I will
fight for you as an even more powerful demon!
speaker: Rokuro
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Kibutsuji          What makes
you think you can order me to give you my blood?
You’re beyond shameless.
Remember who you are.
speaker: Rokuro
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text: Ah… You misunderstood me! You misunderstood me! I just…!
speaker: Rokuro
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text: Kibutsuji          Shut up. I misunderstood nothing.
speaker: Rokuro
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
I’m never
mistaken about anything. I’m the one who calls all the shots. My word is absolute.
speaker: Rokuro
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

speaker: Rokuro
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Kibutsuji          You have no right to reject what I say. Whatever
I say is right is the right
thing.
speaker: Rokuro
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
You tried to tell me what to do. You deserve
to die.
speaker: Rokuro
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text: Kibutsuji          Do you have any last words?
speaker: Rokuro
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Wakuraba        (Thoughts)
He’ll end up killed, too. Everything hinges
on the Master’s mood. I’ll be dead soon myself.
speaker: Rokuro
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Ahh… This is like a dream for me. To
die by your hand in person, and I
so enjoyed hearing the other demons’
last gasps!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
I feel so blessed…
Because I love to see others in despair and agony.
Because it’s like a dream come true
for me! I thank you for leaving me for last!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Kibutsuji          That’s what I like to hear. I’m going to give you an ample share of my blood.
Although you might not be able to
withstand the volume of blood and die.
speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
Kibutsuji          Still, if you do manage to acclimate, you’re
sure to acquire even greater
strength. Make yourself
useful to me, then. Kill the Demon Slayer Hashira.
speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text:
If you can kill the Demon Slayer wearing
hanafuda-like earrings, I’ll give you even more of
my blood.
speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime

Kizuki.

text:
What’s
this? I see something! It’s gushing into me along with Master
Muzan’s blood…
speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

text: Fufu… Fufufu… If I kill the Hashira and this kid, I can get more blood! It’s like a dream!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
In the past, a few months earlier. Nakime
plays her biwa, summoning the Lower Twelve
Kizuki.

speaker: Crow

text:
More than 40 are now missing. You are to join Kyoujurou Rengoku
on site. Head west at once!
speaker: Crow

text:
I have decided to send Tanjirou
and the others
on the Infinite Train mission.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayers
headquarters. Shinobu meets
with Kagaya.

text: Shinobu, may I ask what made you recommend Tanjirou?
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayers
headquarters. Shinobu meets
with Kagaya.

text:
Tanjirou has a pure soul and is capable
of striving hard on a daily basis.
And the upside that he showed exceeded my expectations.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At the Demon Slayers
headquarters. Shinobu meets
with Kagaya.

text:
Above all else, he has a clear goal in mind. To defeat
Kibutsuji.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At the Demon Slayers
headquarters. Shinobu meets
with Kagaya.

text:
As far as that goes, I’m in agreement
with you.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayers
headquarters. Shinobu meets
with Kagaya.

text:
Also, Tanjirou himself told me that his father
had used the Fire Breathing
technique.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At the Demon Slayers
headquarters. Shinobu meets
with Kagaya.

speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayers
headquarters. Shinobu meets
with Kagaya.

text:
At
this time, there’s no denying
that he still has a way to go, but perhaps Rengoku,
the Flame Hashira, might be able to provide some guidance.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
At the Demon Slayers
headquarters. Shinobu meets
with Kagaya.

text:
Yes. Considering his sister, who won’t devour humans even after becoming
a demon, as well as his encounter with Kibutsuji,
it might very well be Tanjirou’s destiny.
speaker: Kagaya
scene:
At the Demon Slayers
headquarters. Shinobu meets
with Kagaya.

scene:
In the Butterfly
Manor. Tanjirou walks through the halls.

In the Butterfly
Manor. Tanjirou walks through the halls.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:

Manor. Tanjirou walks through the halls.

text:
He
bumped into me even though I got out of the way. (Thoughts) Huh? That guy just now… Was he at the Final Selection? (Thoughts) He got such an
amazing build in such a short time. (Thoughts) But I wonder why… his scent…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Butterfly
Manor. Tanjirou walks through the halls.

text:
Long time no see! Glad to see you’re
doing well!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Butterfly
Manor. Tanjirou walks through the halls.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Butterfly
Manor. Tanjirou walks through the halls.

text:
Is that so? You’re
heading out now?
speaker: Aoi
scene: In the courtyard. Aoi hangs some laundry.

text:
It was only for a short time,
but I’m glad we got to spend
that time together. Good luck to you.
speaker: Aoi
scene: In the courtyard. Aoi hangs some laundry.

speaker: Aoi
scene: In the courtyard. Aoi hangs some laundry.

text:
Thank you so much for looking
out for us when you were so busy! Thanks
to you, we can go back into
battle!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the courtyard. Aoi hangs some laundry.

speaker: Aoi
scene: In the courtyard. Aoi hangs some laundry.

text:
After all, I
survived the Final Selection only by luck. And then I was too afraid to go into
battle. I’m a coward.
speaker: Aoi
scene: In the courtyard. Aoi hangs some laundry.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the courtyard. Aoi hangs some laundry.

speaker: Aoi
scene: In the courtyard. Aoi hangs some laundry.

text:
Since you helped me out, Miss Aoi, you’re
part of me now. And
I’m carrying all of your emotions onto the battlefield with
me!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the courtyard. Aoi hangs some laundry.

speaker: Aoi
scene: In the courtyard. Aoi hangs some laundry.

text:
All right! Look after me if I get hurt again,
okay?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the courtyard. Aoi hangs some laundry.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text: We’re heading out now. Thanks for everything!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
All I did was follow the Master’s orders.
There’s no need for you to thank me. Farewell.
speaker: Kanao
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text: What was that you just flipped?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

speaker: Kanao
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
Money? It says “heads”
and “tails”, huh? Why did you flip it?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

speaker: Kanao
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
You really
made it twirl
around!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
I flip this to decide what I haven’t
been ordered to do. I just decided
whether or not to
speak with you.
speaker: Kanao
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
“Don’t speak” was heads, and “speak”
was tails. Because
it came up tails, I spoke to you.
Farewell.
speaker: Kanao
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
Why don’t you decide
for yourself? What did you want to do, Kanao? Kanao        It doesn’t matter.
Nothing matters to me,
so I can’t decide for myself. Tanjirou I don’t think there’s anything in this
world that doesn’t matter.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
I guess…
the voice in your heart is really
tiny.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
Hmm… Sure, following orders
is important, but… Ah! Hey, can I borrow that for a
second?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

speaker: Kanao
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
Okay! Let’s
toss this to
decide!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

speaker: Kanao
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
Whether or not… you’re
going to listen
hard to the voice in your own heart from now on!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text: Ahh! I flipped it too high!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text:
Heads! Let’s make it heads! If it comes
up heads, Kanao, you’re going to follow
your heart!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

speaker: Kanao
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text: Ah! Huh? Where did it go? Ahh!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

it, so I couldn’t see it the moment it fell.
speaker: Kanao

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

So, your heart can grow as strong
as you want it to!
speaker: Tanjirou

text: All right! See you again someday!

I saw his hand when he flipped
it. I’m sure he didn’t
cheat.

text:
Just by chance. And if it was tails,
I was going to keep tossing it over and over until it
came up heads! Hehehe!

speaker: Kanao
scene: On the veranda overlooking the courtyard. Kanao sits by herself.

text: You can do it! You can do it! You can do it!

text: Rengoku          (Thoughts) Hmm? Why did I come here?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of
him.

text:
Rengoku          (Thoughts) Oh, right. To report to my father…
that I’ve become
a Hashira.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of
him.

text:
Shinjurou         So
what if you’ve become a Hashira?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of
him.

speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of

You’re never going to amount to anything anyway.
Neither you… nor I.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of
him.

speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of

text:
Was our father pleased
to hear your news? Do you think our father
will acknowledge me if I become a Hashira, too?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of
him.

text:
Rengoku          (Thoughts)
He wasn’t always like that. After
all, he did rise to the rank of Hashira in the
Demon Slayer Corps.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of
him.

text: He was a passionate man. And yet, one day, out of the blue, he quit being a swordsman… suddenly.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of
him.

text:
The man who’d
raised us both with such enthusiasm… Why? (Thoughts) It’s pointless to think
about such things, so stop.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of
him.

text:
Senjurou
is even worse off. He barely has any memories
of our mother, who died of
illness when he was very young, and just look at the state our father is in.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of
him.

text:
Rengoku          I’m going to be honest. Our father wasn’t
happy to hear it.
He told me that it meant nothing.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of
him.

text:
But that’s not enough
to extinguish my passion! This flame inside
my heart will never go out!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of
him.

text: I’ll never give in. And Senjurou…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of
him.

text:
Rengoku          …
you are not like me.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of
him.

text:
You have a big brother… who believes in his little
brother.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of
him.

text:
Rengoku          No matter
what path you take, you’re
going to become
a fine human being! Keep that
burning passion inside your heart! Let’s do our best!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of
him.

text: Rengoku          Let’s do our best and live on! No matter how lonely it gets.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
In Rengoku’s
dream. Rengoku finds himself in his family’s
home. Shinjurou lies in bed in front of
him.

text:
Looking good.
Those ropes that I created
are used for a special
technique that allows
one to invade the dreams of whoever you’re tethered to.
speaker: Enmu
scene: On top of the Mugen Train. Enmu looks toward the back of the train.

text:
I always fight with the utmost
caution.
speaker: Enmu
scene: On top of the Mugen Train. Enmu looks toward the back of the train.

text:
Once you’re
asleep, Hashira or not, you’re no different from a baby. I’ll enjoy the feast after killing
the Demon Slayers.
speaker: Enmu
scene: On top of the Mugen Train. Enmu looks toward the back of the train.

hurry.

launches his attack

text:
Hang in there!
I was lucky I could bounce off the demon’s
flesh! Cool, huh?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Is your belly okay?!
Your belly that got stabbed!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text: I’m… all right. What about you?

scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text: Never felt better! I didn’t even catch a cold!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text: I won’t be able to move… for a while.
speaker: Tanjirou

On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou

On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text: It’s okay if that bastard dies!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou

text:
Ngh… He’s the one who stabbed
you in the belly, remember?! He’s got his leg stuck and can’t move!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
His leg’s shattered, and he can’t walk anymore!
Just leave him there, and he’ll die!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Then he’s already atoned
for his sin. Help him, will you?
speaker: Tanjirou

On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou

text:
Hmph! I’ll go for you, then! Because I’m the boss! Because my minion asked
me to!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
After I rescue him, I’m going to pluck
out all of that guy’s hair! Hmph!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

speaker: Tanjirou

On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou

We have to… save the injured… before
it’s too late.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Nezuko… Zenitsu… Rengoku…
I’m sure they’re
all safe! You have to believe!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
My body is disintegrating. I can’t regenerate. (Thoughts) Did I lose? Am I
going to die? Me?
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text: Ridiculous. Ridiculous! I haven’t been able to go all out!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
I couldn’t devour a single human! My plan to fuse with the train and devour humans en masse just went up in
smoke!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
And look what I’ve been reduced to! After
all the time and trouble
I’ve taken! (Thoughts) It was
him! It’s all his fault!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Even though I’d taken 200 humans hostage,
I still struggled! I was held at
bay! Is this the power of a Hashira?
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
And him… He was fast, too. Even though
he never broke the spell completely!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Not to mention
that girl! She’s a demon!
What’s that about?!
A demon, joining forces with Demon Slayers? Why
hasn’t Master Muzan killed the traitor?!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Dammit…
Dammit! In the first place…
it all started going downhill
once that brat broke my
spell! That brat is to blame!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text: I wish I could kill at least that brat! Somehow!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
That’s
right, and that boar, too! I could’ve
at least killed
that brat! But that boar thwarted me. His intuition is
extraordinary. He could sense my gaze!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Am I
going to lose? Am I going to die? Oh, what a nightmare! What a nightmare!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
It’s always the bottom-feeder demons
who get killed by the Demon Slayers.
In the Upper Ranks, the same demons have remained for the last few
centuries. They’re
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
strong enough
to defeat Hashira
who’ve killed an untold number
of demons. Do they
have otherworldly powers?
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Even after receiving
so much of his blood,
I couldn’t reach the Upper Ranks!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Ahh! I
want to do it over!
I want to do it over!
What a miserable nightmare this is…
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Rengoku          I
see you’ve mastered
Total Concentration, Constant. Impressive!
speaker: Enmu
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou

text:
Rengoku          After all, Constant is the first step toward becoming a Hashira. Although, there might be 10,000 steps before you can become a
Hashira.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou

at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Rengoku          You’re bleeding
from your abdomen.
You have to concentrate harder
and improve the precision of your breathing.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
Make your nerves
reach every corner of your body.
There’s a blood vessel. A torn blood vessel.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack

text: Rengoku          That’s it. Stanch it. Stop the bleeding.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack

On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou

speaker: Tanjirou

launches his attack

text: Rengoku          Great! Looks like you stopped it.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

text:
You’ll be able
to do all kinds of things when you master
breathing. Not that you’ll be able to do everything, but you’ll become
a stronger version
of yourself than yesterday for sure.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou

text:
Everyone’s safe! There are hordes of injured people,
but no one’s life is in danger. Don’t strain yourself. Take it
easy and rest up.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
launches his attack
at Enmu’s backbone.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the Mugen Train. Tanjirou

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text: Upper… Three? What’s he doing here right now?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Tanjirou
