text:
Rengoku          (Thoughts)
He sure can regenerate fast. This heavy and overwhelming demon aura… So, this
is an Upper Rank.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
I can’t understand why you’d go after a wounded person
first.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
He could get in the way of the chitchat… between
you and me.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Rengoku          What would you and I have to talk about? I’m meeting you for the first time,
but I already dislike you.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Is that right? Well, I
loathe weak humans,
too. The sight of a weakling makes my skin crawl.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text: Rengoku          Then it looks like our senses of value are completely different.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
All right, then I have a brilliant proposal
for you.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Why don’t you become
a demon, too?
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
I can tell your strength at a glance.
You’re a Hashira,
aren’t you?
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text: Your fighting spirit has been honed to the hilt. It’s close to the realm of the highest.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Rengoku          I’m the Flame Hashira,
Kyoujurou Rengoku.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text: Kyoujurou… Let me tell you why you can’t enter the realm of the highest.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
It’s because
you’re a human.
Because you’re going to grow old. Because
you’re going to die.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Become a demon, Kyoujurou. Do that, and you can go on training
for a hundred, for two hundred years. You can become
stronger.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Of all the demons that I’ve met until now, he
has the strongest scent of Kibutsuji! I have to help him fight!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Rengoku          Both growing
old and dying are part of the beauty of being an ephemeral creature
like a human.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
The fact that we grow old and die is what makes human life so unbearably precious
and noble.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
“Strength” isn’t a word used to describe
just the body. This boy isn’t weak!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
I’ll repeat
it as many times as it takes.
You and I have different senses of value. No matter what the reason, I will
not become a demon!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Technique Development… Destructive Death, Compass
Needle!
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text: If you refuse to become a demon, I’ll kill you.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
There were never any Flames among
the Hashira I’ve killed until
now.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
And no one ever took me up on my offer,
either.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Why do you think
that is? As a fellow
martial artist, I just don’t get it.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Not when only the chosen ones can become
demons!
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Watching the hideous decline
of someone blessed
with extraordinary powers…
It pains me! I can’t bear it!
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Die, Kyoujurou… while you’re
still young and strong.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text: Rengoku          Flame Breathing, Fourth Form… Blooming Flame Undulation!
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Rengoku          (Thoughts) When he strikes
the air with his fist,
the attack will reach me here.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
He can move faster than the blink
of an eye.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Rengoku          (Thoughts) If I allow him to fight from a distance
like this, slicing
his head off will be tricky.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Rengoku          (Thoughts) … I’ll just have to get up
close!
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
This superb reaction speed
of yours…
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text: … and these breathtaking sword skills will be lost, too, Kyoujurou!
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Rengoku          It happens to everyone!
It’s a fact of life for any human!
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Rengoku          If that wound reopens,
it’ll be fatal!
Stand back! That’s
an order!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text: Don’t bother with that weakling, Kyoujurou! Come on, give me your best shot!
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Inosuke
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text:
Fight with me forever
and get stronger with me.
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text: You have what it takes to do that!
speaker: Akaza
scene: Near the wreckage of the Mugen Train. Akaza appears.

text: Rengoku          I’ll pass! Let me repeat it. I don’t like you!
speaker: Akaza

left eye, shattered
ribs, and damaged

irreparable.
speaker: Akaza
scene:
Near the wreckage of the Mugen
Train. Rengoku breathes
heavily.

Near the wreckage of the Mugen
Train. Rengoku breathes
heavily.

Ngh!

It’s partly because

Kagura technique!

speaker: Ruka
scene: In Rengoku’s past. Ruka sits in bed.

speaker: Ruka
scene: In Rengoku’s past. Ruka sits in bed.

text: I want you to think hard… about what I’m about to ask you.
speaker: Ruka
scene: In Rengoku’s past. Ruka sits in bed.

text:
Do you know why you were born stronger
than others?
speaker: Ruka
scene: In Rengoku’s past. Ruka sits in bed.

text:
Y.Rengoku        Mm…
Ah… I don’t know!
speaker: Ruka
scene: In Rengoku’s past. Ruka sits in bed.

text:
So that you can save weaker
people.
speaker: Ruka
scene: In Rengoku’s past. Ruka sits in bed.

text:
Those who were born blessed with more gifts than others
are obligated to use those gifts for the world and other
people.
speaker: Ruka
scene: In Rengoku’s past. Ruka sits in bed.

text:
You must never use that God-given
strength to hurt others or for personal
gain.
speaker: Ruka
scene: In Rengoku’s past. Ruka sits in bed.

text:
It is the duty of those born strong to help the weak. It is a mission
they must fulfill responsibly. Make sure you never
forget that.
speaker: Ruka
scene: In Rengoku’s past. Ruka sits in bed.

speaker: Ruka
scene: In Rengoku’s past. Ruka sits in bed.

speaker: Ruka

text:
I
don’t have much more time to live. I
was blessed to be the mother
of such a strong and gentle child.
speaker: Ruka
scene: In Rengoku’s past. Ruka sits in bed.

text: I will entrust everything to you.
speaker: Ruka
scene: In Rengoku’s past. Ruka sits in bed.

have to get away!

I have to find refuge
from the sunlight!

On the battlefield. Rengoku

On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
I have to get away from the
sun!

On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

On the battlefield. Rengoku

text:
Don’t run away! Don’t
run away, you coward! Don’t run away!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

speaker: Akaza
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
What the hell is that brat talking
about? Doesn’t he have a brain in his
head?!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
I’m not running
away from you! I’m running
away from the sun!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
And besides, the battle’s already
been decided! He’ll run out of strength
and die soon!
speaker: Akaza
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
The Demon
Slayer Corps… is always fighting
you demons in the dark of the night where you have the advantage! That’s
right, us flesh and blood humans!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
Our wounds won’t close up that easily! And we cannot regenerate a limb once it’s lost! Don’t run away, you bastard! You
bastard! You coward!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
Rengoku is way more amazing than you! He’s stronger!
Rengoku didn’t lose! He didn’t let anybody die!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
He fought
to the end! He protected them to the end! You’re
the one who lost! It’s Rengoku who won!!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
You’ll reopen that stomach
wound. You’re badly
injured, too, remember?
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text: If you die, young Kamado, it’ll mean I’m the loser.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text: Come over here. Let’s talk a bit, one last time.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the battlefield. Rengoku
regains his strength.

text:
There’s
something that I remembered… while I was dreaming. You should go to my parents’
home, the Rengoku residence. There should be some notes left by the preceding
Flame Hashira.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text: My father read them often, but since I never did, I don’t know what’s in them.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
There might be some kind of record of that Hinokami
Kagura that you mentioned.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
R-Rengoku, please
don’t talk any more. Please
stop the bleeding
with a breathing technique! Isn’t there a way to close up your wounds?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text: I’m going to tell you all I can while I can still talk, so listen, will you?
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
Tell my little brother
Senjurou… to follow
his heart… and to walk down the path that he
feels is right.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
Tell my father…
that I want him to take care of himself. One more thing, young Kamado…
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
I believe in your little sister.
I accept her as a member of the Demon Slayer Corps.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
I saw her bleeding
as she protected the humans
inside the train.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
Anyone who risks their lives fighting
demons to protect
humans… is a rightful member of
the Demon Slayer Corps, no matter what anyone else says.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text: Go ahead and live with your head held high!
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
No matter
how devastated you may be by your own weakness
or uselessness… set your heart ablaze.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
Grit your teeth and look straight
ahead.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text: Even if you stop and crouch down, time won’t wait for you… or snuggle you and grieve along with you.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
Don’t feel bad that I’m going to die here. As a Hashira,
of course I would shield
my juniors.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
Any other Hashira would’ve
done the same thing. We never let the young buds get nipped.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
Young Kamado…
Boar Head Boy… Yellow Boy… Keep learning
and grow. And then
become the next Hashira supporting the Demon Slayer Corps.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
I believe in you. I believe
in you all.
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
Mother…
Do you think I did it right?
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text: Did I carry out what I had to do… and my duties?
speaker: Rengoku
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

speaker: Ruka
scene:
In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

speaker: Rengoku

In the morning, at the wreckage
of the Mugen Train. Tanjirou
sits with Rengoku.

text:
When the train went off the rails, Rengoku
had unleashed all these techniques… He must’ve kept the damage to the cars to a minimum.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text: I can’t believe he’s gone… I mean, did an Upper Rank demon really show up?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text:
Why would an Upper Rank demon come here?
Was it that strong? I mean…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text:
As soon as I master one thing, I find another
thick wall right
in front of me…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text:
While more powerful people
are fighting far beyond it… I just can’t make it there yet!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text: If I’m still stumbling around in a place like this, can I… can I… ever become like Rengoku?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

speaker: Zenitsu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text:
Stop asking dumbass things
like whether you can or can’t be like him!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text:
He said he believes
in you, so just think about how you’re going
to measure up to that!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text:
All living
things just go back to the earth
when they die! Sobbing or sniveling won’t
bring them back!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text: Don’t cry even if you have regrets! No matter how pathetic or humiliated you feel, you still have to go on living!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text:
But you’re crying, too. There are tears flooding
out from that
headpiece…
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

speaker: Zenitsu
scene: Sometime later. Zenitsu joins Tanjirou and Inosuke with Nezuko, who is now in her box.

text: Get over here! We’re gonna train!
speaker: Inosuke

Kyoujurou did a great job, then. What a remarkable child.

text:
I’m not sad. I don’t have much longer
to live, either.
speaker: Tomioka

text:
Soon, I’ll be joining

scene:

text:
My, he certainly seems like a bright young
child.
speaker: Guest
scene:
At night. In the form of a young boy,
Kibutsuji goes to a bookstore before returning home to a large manor where his adoptive parents
chat with guests.

text:
Seriously… Not being blessed
with my own offspring had made me despondent… but now that such a fine boy has come to
us, I can rest easy.
speaker: Father
scene:
At night. In the form of a young boy,
Kibutsuji goes to a bookstore before returning home to a large manor where his adoptive parents
chat with guests.

text:
Every day is so blissful. I couldn’t be happier. He’s such a kind little
kid.
speaker: Mother
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text:
So considerate toward the help. I’ve never seen a child his age who is so gentle-
mannered.
speaker: Mother
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text: Blood has nothing to do with parental affection. I’m going to have that boy take over my business for me!
speaker: Father
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text:
I really envy you! I wish I could
trade our idiot son for him!
speaker: Guest
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

speaker: Group
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text: He’s a fine boy. No doubt about it.
speaker: Father
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text:
It’s just that… as he suffers
from a skin disease, he can’t go outside during
the day.
speaker: Father
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

speaker: Guest
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents

text:
I was hoping that we could develop a wonder drug for him at my company. The sooner
the better.
speaker: Father
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text: I am here to report to you… Lord Muzan.
speaker: Akaza
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text: Kibutsuji          Have you found what I asked for?
speaker: Akaza
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text: I looked for it but came up empty.
speaker: Akaza
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text:
Having no way to even confirm
its existence… I was unable to locate
the blue spider
lily.
speaker: Akaza
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

speaker: Akaza
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text: I will continue to do my utmost to live up to your expectations, Lord Muzan.

Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text: As ordered, I did eliminate one Hashira, so you may rest assured.

Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text:
Kibutsuji          You seem to have the wrong
idea about this…
Akaza.
speaker: Akaza
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

speaker: Akaza
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text:
Kibutsuji          So what if you disposed of one Hashira?
As if that were such a feat.
speaker: Akaza
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text:
A demon beating a human is a forgone
conclusion.
speaker: Akaza
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

speaker: Akaza
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text:
Kibutsuji          What I want is for the Demon Slayer
Corps to be annihilated.
speaker: Akaza
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text:
Pummel the life out of every
last one of them,
and never let another one enter my line of sight again.
speaker: Akaza
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text:
It’s hardly
a complicated task. And yet, I’m still waiting for it to happen. What do you have
to say about that?
speaker: Akaza
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text:
You boast of having
killed a Hashira,
but there were three other
Demon Slayers there.
speaker: Akaza
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text:
Why did you fail to kill them off after I made a point of sending you there because
you happened to be nearby?
speaker: Akaza
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

speaker: Akaza
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

speaker: Akaza
scene:

Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

text:
To think that you suffered a blow by a swordsman
who isn’t even a Hashira…
How far you have fallen,
Upper Three.
speaker: Akaza
scene:
At the manor.
Kibutsuji’s adoptive parents
speak with their guests.

Are you okay?

I know what you look like,
boy!

The next time we meet, I’m going to spray your brain matter

Aoi makes dumplings

Aoi makes dumplings

Aoi makes dumplings

on their feet.

Aoi makes dumplings

text:

person, too. That’s the kind of sound
he gave off. Not that it wasn’t a little odd, but his sound was strong and
kind.

Aoi makes dumplings

He’s carrying out Rengoku’s will by guiding

follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text:
Excuse me! Are you all right?

follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

scene:

text:
Look what he got for becoming
a swordsman when he had no real talent. No wonder he died!

scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai

text: What a fool of a son Kyoujurou was!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text:
A person’s talent level
is determined the day he’s born.

scene:

follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text:
Only a mere handful
have any talent.
The rest are just members
of the masses! Completely useless trash, they are!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text:
Shinjurou         Kyoujurou was in that group. He had no real talent.
So why wouldn’t he end up dead?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text: Senjurou! The funeral’s over now. It’s high time you wiped that gloomy look off your face!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:

about him like that!

follows Rengoku’s kasugai

text:

you?

follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text: Get out! Don’t you dare set foot on our property!

follows Rengoku’s kasugai

follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text: Shinjurou         You… I get it now. You… You’re a wielder of the Sun Breathing technique, right? Am I right?!

follows Rengoku’s kasugai

text: So fast! There were no amateur moves!

Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai

text:
Senjurou          Father! Please stop! Just look at his face! Can’t you see that he’s not
well?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text:
Shinjurou         You keep your mouth
shut!

Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text:
Why are you acting
like this, anyway?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text:
Insulting your own child,
who lost his life… striking
him… What is it that you want to do?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text: Shinjurou         You… You’re mocking us, aren’t you?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text:
What makes you say that? I have no idea what you mean!
Now you’re just slandering me!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text: Shinjurou         That’s because you’re a wielder of the Sun Breathing technique!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text:
I know all about those earrings.
It was written in the book!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai

text: Sun Breathing… Could he be talking about Hinokami Kagura?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text:
Shinjurou         The first
breathing… The first
breathing technique ever created… The most powerful
of them all.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text: And all the other techniques are derived from Sun Breathing!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text:
All the others just mimic Sun Breathing. They’re
just cheap imitations, retrograde versions
of Sun Breathing! Fire, Water, Wind… All of them!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai

text:
We’ve been charcoal
burners for generations. We have records
to prove it.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text:
Sun Breathing… Hinokami
Kagura… No, never
mind that… There’s something more important than
that!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text:
Shinjurou         Don’t get cocky just because you’re
a wielder of the Sun Breathing technique, boy!

scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text: Can’t you see how devastated I am by my own weakness?! Why, you… miserable old fart!

scene:
Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text:
Senjurou          Look out! My father
is…

Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai

Don’t you badmouth Rengoku…
Don’t you dare!

Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai

If Hinokami Kagura
is a Sun Breathing technique… then, that day, why wasn’t I able to save Rengoku?

Somewhere in town. Tanjirou
follows Rengoku’s kasugai
crow.

text:
Senjurou          Here’s some tea. Please
drink it.

Sometime later.
Tanjirou sits in the receiving
room of the Rengoku residence.

Sorry. I mean, for headbutting your father…
Is he okay?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou sits in the receiving
room of the Rengoku residence.

text:
Senjurou          I
think he’ll be fine. He even went out to buy some sake once he came to.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou sits in the receiving
room of the Rengoku residence.

text: Is that right? Senjurou         Thank you very much. Tanjirou
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou sits in the receiving
room of the Rengoku residence.

text: Senjurou          You took a load off my mind.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou sits in the receiving
room of the Rengoku residence.

text:
I could never even talk back when he badmouthed my brother. What were
my brother’s last moments like?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later.
Tanjirou sits in the receiving
room of the Rengoku residence.

text: Senjurou          I see. So, my brother was valiant until the end… Thank you very much.

Sometime later.
Tanjirou sits in the receiving
room of the Rengoku residence.

Forgive me for coming

Tanjirou sits in the receiving

Senjurou          Please don’t worry about it. I’m sure my brother told you the same thing,
didn’t he?

Sometime later.
Tanjirou sits in the receiving
room of the Rengoku residence.

Sometime later.
Tanjirou sits in the receiving
room of the Rengoku residence.

text: I believe this must be it.

Sometime later.
Tanjirou sits in the receiving
room of the Rengoku residence.

pages?

Tanjirou sits in the receiving

It’s unreadable for the most part. Was it like this from the start?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

text:
Senjurou          No, that’s not possible. After all, the Flame Hashira
Chronicles are stored
very carefully.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

text: I believe it was my father who tore those pages. I’m so sorry.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

text:
No, it’s not your fault, Senjurou. Please don’t feel bad about
it.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

to end up learning nothing
about Hinokami Kagura or
what my father called “Sun Breathing”.

scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the

It’s all right. I know what it
is that I must do.

At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

pages have been torn.

Even when it comes to Hinokami
Kagura, though I know how to perform
the dance… I still haven’t managed to master it.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

When I use Hinokami
Kagura while maintaining Total Concentration, I can’t move my
body the way I want to.

scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

text: I’m to blame for that. I can’t physically keep up with it.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

text: My stamina’s improved thanks to Total Concentration, Constant, but it’s still not enough.

scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

text:
I’m supposed
to gain stamina by the day if I
can maintain Constant, but I can’t get stronger in an instant.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

text:
That day, if only I’d been more powerful in an instant…
If only there’d
been a way for me to become strong enough to save
Rengoku…

At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

I’ve tried to come up with one. But there’s no such convenient method. There just weren’t
any shortcuts.

scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

text:
All I can do is struggle. To move forward
by pulling out all the stops to do whatever
it is that I can. No matter how grueling or frustrating it may be.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

text:
And then, I… am going to become a powerful Hashira
like Kyoujurou… no matter what.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

text:
Normally, I would’ve become
his Tsuguko and would’ve had to train
as a Hashira in reserve.

scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

text: But… my Nichirin Sword failed to change color.

scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

text:
Nichirin Swords
don’t change color until you’ve
acquired a certain
level of sword skills…
but no matter how much training I underwent, it was no good.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

text:
I’m going to forget
about becoming a swordsman… and be useful
to others in some other way.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

text:
This will break the line of the Flame Hashira and inflict
damage on its long history…
but I’m sure that my brother… will forgive me.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

text: Walk down the path that you feel is right.

At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the

text:
If anyone dares to badmouth you, Senjurou… I’ll personally headbutt
them!

At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the

Senjurou          I
don’t think that’s
a good idea…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Rengoku residence. Tanjirou has opened
the record of the Flame Hashira to find that the
pages have been torn.

the Flame Hashira
Chronicles myself. I’ll look into other books,
as well. I’ll also
ask my father, and if I find out anything, I’ll send word through our crow.

I’m glad that I got to talk to you. Please
get home safely.

toward me. I already know what he’d say!
Now get out of my sight!

text: “Please take care of yourself.” Those are the only words that my brother left behind for you, Father.

I can’t breathe.

speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the entertainment district.
Uzui is on the search for his wives. He stops in front of a
house, where he finds Hinatsuru tied up by Daki’s obi sashes.

text:
Shinjurou         (Flashback)
Dear Kamado… I know that I wronged you. (Flashback) Thank you for shedding tears over Kyoujurou.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the past. Shinjurou
writes a letter to Tanjirou.

text:
I hear that you’ve also been exchanging letters with Senjurou
for the past four months. He seems to be in a much better place now.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the past. Shinjurou
writes a letter to Tanjirou.

text: I’m ashamed that our first meeting went the way it did.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the past. Shinjurou
writes a letter to Tanjirou.

text:
At a time when my own incompetence had left me shattered, things went
from bad to worse when my wife succumbed to illness.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the past. Shinjurou
writes a letter to Tanjirou.

text:

but drink myself
into a stupor and wallow. There’s no bigger fool than me.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:

writes a letter to Tanjirou.

text: Unlike me, Kyoujurou was a fine son.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the past. Shinjurou
writes a letter to Tanjirou.

text:

he trained by reading the Guide
to Flame Breathing and became a Hashira. Even though there were only three
volumes.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:

writes a letter to Tanjirou.

of his mother’s blood. Both Kyoujurou
and Senjurou are fine boys.

writes a letter to Tanjirou.

text: And Kamado… you have an even more amazing power.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:

same red mark on their forehead that you have. And so I’m sure that you…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the past. Shinjurou
writes a letter to Tanjirou.

text: No, Shinjurou… I wasn’t born with this scar.
speaker: Tanjirou

brazier. Later, I injured myself
there during the Final Selection, and that’s how it
ended up the way it is now.

prepares to fight.

me.

prepares to fight.

First, worship
and praise me! We’ll discuss

speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
You were human once, weren’t you? You must’ve
shed tears once,
struggling against pain and
suffering.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
You really are annoying,
rambling on like that!
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
I don’t remember anything
about the past. I’m a demon now, so who cares about that?
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
Demons never grow old. They don’t need money to eat. They don’t get sick.
They don’t die. They have
nothing to lose.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
Not to mention… we beautiful, powerful
demons can do anything we want!
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text: Blood Demon Art… Eight-Layered Obi Slash!
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
Now, you can’t
stop this, can you? It’s because you’re
an idiot! (Thoughts) This
interweaving attack leaves you with nowhere to run.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
The parts of my body that were split
off to take control of this red-light district… Now that it’s whole
again, my speed is in a class of its own.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
You could barely
hold your own against my non-Blood Demon Art attacks,
so you have no chance now.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
It’s all over for you, isn’t it? Farewell. I’m going to slash you, dull sword and
all.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
And now, I’ll be making
my way to that Hashira!
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
Hinokami Kagura… Burning
Bones, Summer Sun.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text: That hurts! What is this pain?
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
It’s like a burning
pain where I received that slash! I can’t regenerate like I’m supposed
to.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
But his wounds
must be deep, too. Making
such violent moves would
normally rupture his body on the spot!
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
In the first place, how can he slice my belt? Its durability has increased.
(Thoughts) My fingertips are trembling… Is this me?
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
Damn him… Now he’s faster
than before.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
It doesn’t make sense… It doesn’t make sense!
Don’t you feel any pain? Are
you human?
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text: As if someone like you… could ever hope to decapitate me!
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
It’s soft. It’s too soft for me to cut through. It blunted my sword slash
by bending and weaving.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
I won’t let you get away…
you ugly, vile brat!
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text: There are more belts now… 13 of them.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
If I dodge them, they might wreak even more havoc.
(Thoughts) But for some reason… they’re awfully slow.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
I won’t let you cut me, not this time! Making
contact with my neck just now was a fluke!
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text: The belts he warded off with his sword ridge are now pinned in one spot…
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
You really think you’ve
stopped me?! I’ll blow you away!
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text: You think you can pull them tight so you can slash them? I can let them loose in the blink of an eye.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
There’s no way you can overcome
this distance in an instant
--
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
Huh? He slashed
them? So fast…
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
It’s simple. I just have to bring my sword down faster
than they can start
bending.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text: I can do it this time. I can slash her.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Hanako
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Hanako
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
No matter how you struggle, that’s
the best you can do. I feel sorry for
you.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
I can’t stop coughing. It’s so hard to breathe…! (Thoughts) I must’ve gone way past my stamina
threshold.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text: All I can see ahead of me is darkness. All I can hear is the sound of my own heartbeat.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
That’s right.
Your wounds won’t
be healing anytime
soon, so no wonder you’ve
ended up like this.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
I’ll return
the favor by slicing your head off!
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Nezuko
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Nezuko
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text: You have a lot of nerve doing that to me! You… Right, it’s you! It’s you, isn’t it?!
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
The one he was talking about
was you, huh?!
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
Kibutsuji          (Flashback) Daki… There’s a demon who slipped from my grasp, just like Tamayo.
(Flashback) Find her and get rid of her. You’re the only one I can turn to.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
She’s a girl clad in a kimono with a hemp leaf pattern
and a checkered belt.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Nezuko
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
Yes… Of course I’ll be happy to torture
her to death! As you wish!
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Nezuko
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text: Is kicking the only thing you know?!
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Nezuko
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
Could you be any weaker? I can see that you’ve hardly devoured any humans. I wonder
how you managed to escape his control.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
You poor thing! Your torso and lower body went their separate ways, didn’t they? You’d
better not move.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
A half-developed demon like you can’t
possibly regenerate right
away, I’m sure.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
We’re both demons, after all. I won’t bully you anymore.
I’ll absorb you into my belt, and when morning comes, I’ll kill you by
exposing you to the sun.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
Demons killing each other…
Such a waste of time.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Nezuko
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
Hold on a second. What’s
this?
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
She regenerated her leg. Never
mind her leg… How can she be standing?
(Thoughts) I know I just severed her body. I know that I felt it. I slashed her
for sure.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Nezuko
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
Her healing and regeneration speed… is… Upper
Rank caliber.
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Nezuko
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Nezuko
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text: What is this cruelty? This intimidating air?
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text: She changed all of a sudden…
speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
Big Bro… You and our sister sure take after each other.
You’re gentle but scary when you get mad.
speaker: Takeo
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
Like our sister,
when that rough-looking grown-up bumped into a kid and hurt him, she got in his face, asking him
to apologize.
speaker: Takeo
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
I mean,
luckily there were tons of grown-ups around, but… it was scary for
me. Since people who get mad for others tend not to have any regard for their
own safety.
speaker: Takeo
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

text:
And because of that, they may lose something precious
someday. That scares me.
speaker: Takeo
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Nezuko
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Daki
scene: At Tanjirou’s location. Tanjirou continues to stare down Daki.

speaker: Nezuko

text:
You’re
a one-trick pony, aren’t you? (Thoughts) Your neck is next!
speaker: Daki

I’m going to chop you up into little

in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text: If someone like me gives that impression, you really are living a blessed life.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
You may be centuries
old, but if you’ve
stayed shut up in a place like this, I guess
you can’t help but be ignorant of the real world.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text: What do you know about it?!
speaker: Daki
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
But you have no clue, do you? See, this country
is vast. It’s teeming with people who’d blow your mind.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
Some are complete enigmas.
Some can take up a sword and become a Hashira in two
months.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
Me, chosen?
Don’t give me that crap! Just how many lives do you think I’ve let slip through my fingers until now?
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
That’s
right… I can’t be like Rengoku!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
Gyuutarou       Grr…
Then how do you explain
it?
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
My Blood Sickles are drenched with deadly poison,
yet you simply
refuse to die!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
I come from a line of shinobi. I’ve become resistant, so poison doesn’t
work on me.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text: The shinobi were wiped out during the Edo Period. Don’t give us that crap!
speaker: Daki
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
The shinobi exist.
I had nine brothers and sisters. Seven of them died by the
time I turned 15.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
Panicked
by our clan’s decline, my father, just like a man possessed, forced us to submit to brutal training.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
The only survivors
were myself and my brother,
who was two years younger.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
My
brother was exactly like my father. The same mindset, the same mannerisms. His subordinates were pawns. His wives were expendable if they produced heirs. No one else ever had any
say. Resolutely indifferent.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
And I… didn’t
want to become like him!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At night,
in the Entertainment District. Uzui faces off against Daki and Gyuutarou.

text:
Ubuyashiki      (Flashback) It’s hard, isn’t it, Tengen?
The path you have chosen.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past. Uzui speaks with Ubuyashiki at the Demon Slayer Corps
headquarters.

text:
Rejecting the values that shape you, that were instilled in you during your
childhood, even as you place yourself on the battlefield… That’s surely
agonizing.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past. Uzui speaks with Ubuyashiki at the Demon Slayer Corps
headquarters.

text:
Carrying
all that conflict
and quandaries inside
yourself, you still…
all of you still persist in moving forward and battling on. Isn’t that
right? So that you can protect other people’s lives.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past. Uzui speaks with Ubuyashiki at the Demon Slayer Corps
headquarters.

text:
Thank you. You’re
a remarkable child.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past. Uzui speaks with Ubuyashiki at the Demon Slayer Corps
headquarters.

speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past. Uzui speaks with Ubuyashiki at the Demon Slayer Corps
headquarters.

text:
I’m the one who should
be grateful.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the past. Uzui speaks with Ubuyashiki at the Demon Slayer Corps
headquarters.

text:
Master,
for your sake,
I’d never think twice about laying down my life.
I can surely accomplish
anything.
speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
Those who have baggage like conflict or quandaries are spineless fools. That’s always been the story of my
life.
speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
What the hell are you laughing
about?
speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
Gyuutarou       The
poison’s slowly affecting you, after all. Slowly but surely.
speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
Claiming it didn’t work on you was just bravado! Pretty
humiliating, huh? Hehehehe…
speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text: Oh, no! It has absolutely no effect on me! Wanna see me dance?
speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
I’m so on fire that I could eat 100 bowls of tempura
udon! In a flashy way, that is!
speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
Gyuutarou       Grr…
Don’t you dare kick my little sister!
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) Well, those are unique explosions. They can inflict
damage to a demon’s body and explode with the slightest
friction from a strike.
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
She got hit because she slashed one without realizing
that. She’s always taking a hit, that one!
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text: He’s holding onto the tip of his sword. What kind of insane grip does he have?!
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
Tsk… Damn, I botched
the chance to finish off this one!
speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text: Damn you! Damn you… I’ll make you pay for this!
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
It’s not fair… It’s not fair. Why am I the one who’s always getting
beheaded? Ahhh!!
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
Gyuutarou       You…
You’re onto us, aren’t you?
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
Gyuutarou       Not that finding out about
us will do you any good!
You’re going to die a slow and steady
death, anyway.
speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
Even as we speak,
we’re creeping toward victory, aren’t
we?
speaker: Uzui
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Inosuke
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
Better not forget me! Not only yours truly, Lord Inosuke,
but his minion is here,
as well!
speaker: Inosuke
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

text:
Gyuutarou       Who
the hell are these guys?
speaker: Zenitsu
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Daki
scene: In the present. Uzui regains his spirit.

speaker: Daki

At Tanjirou’s location. Gyuutarou and Daki prepare

text:
Hey, you guys… Talk about flashy
entrances! That’s what I like to see!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
At Tanjirou’s location. Gyuutarou and Daki prepare
to fight against
Tanjirou, Inosuke, Zenitsu, and Uzui.

text: Gyuutarou       Ha! You can summon all the underlings you want, but there’ll still be no blissful future waiting for you!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
You’re all going to die, anyway,
so stop staring with those sparkling eyes!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text: There are two demons now. How did that happen?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Also, the Belt Demon isn’t
dead. Are they both Upper Six? Splintered off from each other?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text: If that’s the case… the main unit has to be this man!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
His scent is different. The weight of his scent…
It feels like the back of my throat’s gone numb!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
My hands are shaking. I wonder if it’s from fatigue. Or… is it fear?
(Thoughts) No! Even so, I… we…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text: We’re going to win! Us, the Demon Slayers!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
There’s no way you can win! Not when the Hashira
who’s your only hope is ravaged by poison.
speaker: Daki
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Oh, we’re going to win easy, you dumbass
bottom-feeders! I’m at the top of my game
when I’m shackled by poison in my system!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

speaker: Daki
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text: Shut up! Don’t you dare underestimate humans!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
All three of these boys are my brilliant
Tsuguko! They have relentless grit!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Even if their limbs fall off, they won’t let
go! And I’ve already
identified how to bring you down!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Beheading you at the same time!
Both of you at the same time!
Am I right?
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Otherwise, there’d
be no reason to disperse
your respective skills,
rather than assimilating your
weak sister into yourself!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Hahahaha! I see! It’s that simple!
We’ve as good as won,
huh?
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Gyuutarou       All
those Demon Slayers
perished because they couldn’t do that simple thing.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Not even the Hashira!
Fifteen for me and seven for my sister.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
You heard him! Not a single
one lived to see daybreak!
speaker: Daki
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Long nights are always
on our side, after all.
speaker: Daki
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text:
Every last one of you, just
die!
speaker: Daki
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

speaker: Daki
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

text: Leave that worm woman to me and Sleepyhead! You two go defeat that praying mantis!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,

speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,

text:
Gyuutarou       I
won’t let you kill my sister.
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
In the Entertainment District. Tanjirou, Inosuke,
Zenitsu, and Uzui prepare to fight.

speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text: I have something to say to you.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Apologize to the girl you hurt by pulling
her ear.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Even if it was your earnings
that provided them with their basic needs… that still doesn’t
make those girls your belongings. You have no right to do whatever you want to
them.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Don’t bore me with your stupid
lecture.
speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text: In what world does someone as ugly as you get to speak to me as an equal?
speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
In this city, women
are merchandise. The same as objects. Getting
sold, bought, and destroyed… The owner is free to do
with them as she chooses.
speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text: Ugly people have no right to eat any meals. The inept shouldn’t be treated as humans.
speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
You shouldn’t do the same horrible
things to others that were done to you.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
The horrible
things done to us, the things that made us suffer… We do them back to others and collect on those debts.
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
We can never make up for our own misfortune unless we collect
it from the blessed.
Because that’s the way we live our lives!
speaker: Zenitsu
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
We’ve killed off everyone
who’s ever leveled
false accusations at us, right?
speaker: Daki,
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text: We’re going to slash your windpipes just like we did to the others!
speaker: Daki,
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Unbelievable bloodlust! It’s giving me chills from my elbows to my neck!
(Thoughts) No wonder. You’re up against the Upper Six demon! Get ahold of yourself!
(Thoughts) Uzui has been poisoned. I have to protect him!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Strike
with your sword the instant
he moves! The second he moves an inch! In that instant!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Swing
it! Swing your sword! Evade it! Evade it! Bend backward! Bend…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
What are you doing? He protected you instead, and now you’re
a hindrance!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text: Tons of Belts from up above!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text: I can see everything! All of your movements!
speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Now that my brother’s awake, what you’re
seeing now is my true power!
speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text: Shut up! Stop screeching in that damn shrill voice!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Gyuutarou       Fufufufu… Them being your Tsuguko was a lie, right? Your movements are so out of
sync! What a total bust!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Haha! Hahahaha!
You can’t even get close to me!
speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text: If you want to prove anything, why don’t you shut your trap and see if you can kill us?!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text: Heh… All right, as you wish!
speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Uzui
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Uzui
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
So quick! He really is like a praying mantis!
What’s up with these slashes?
speaker: Uzui
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Uzui
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
There’s
no way out of this!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text: Grr… Heavy! These slashes are so heavy! Ngh…!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Sidestep
it! Ward off the blow! If
you take the blow head-on,
it’ll snap your blade in two!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
If
it’s power versus power, the weaker side always loses! (Thoughts) Don’t misjudge the flow of power and ward it off as you should! (Thoughts) The flexible Water
Breathing technique is better for defence!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text: If it’s only to ward off the blow… my blade never would’ve gotten nicked!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Uzui
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Uzui
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

speaker: Uzui
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text:
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) You can assault
me with your noisy moves, but it’ll do you no good!
speaker: Uzui
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text: Hahahaha! Die! Die! You ugly toads!
speaker: Daki
scene:
On the rooftop of a building.
Zenitsu and Daki land.

text: Gahhh! It’s not just the Belts! Now we have blood blades flying toward us!
speaker: Inosuke
scene:

text: I’m sure the swordsmen who’ve fought the demons until now did just that.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the present. Uzui comes to his senses.

text:
Taking
the breathing techniques and sword skills that suited
them best and modifying them into the form that
would allow them to exert maximum power! They racked their brains! That’s why
so many different offshoots have been created!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the present. Uzui comes to his senses.

text:
Modify
it… into any form. Be flexible! That’s
the fighting style that
Urokodaki taught me!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the present. Uzui comes to his senses.

text:
Even if I can never fully master
Water Breathing like Tomioka has, I won’t
let what Urokodaki taught me go to waste!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the present. Uzui comes to his senses.

text: Gyuutarou       Either way, you’re going down!

Monichi and I are practically unscathed! We gotta take care of this!

The other two are all banged

Sorry! Sorry, everyone! (Thoughts) Sorry, Nezuko.

this wouldn’t have happened!
