speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Tanjirou stands in a snowy
forest.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Tanjirou stands in a snowy
forest.

text: Big Bro, why are you always apologizing?
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Tanjirou stands in a snowy
forest.

text:
If we’re poor, does that make us unhappy?
If we can’t wear pretty
kimonos, should people pity
us?
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Tanjirou stands in a snowy
forest.

text:
Are you so determined to blame someone?
You think it was our father's fault for
dying of illness.
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Tanjirou stands in a snowy
forest.

text:
He tried as hard as he could, and it wasn’t
enough, so we just have to accept
that! We’re humans, after
all, so none of us can expect everything to go our way.
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Tanjirou stands in a snowy
forest.

text: Whether you’re happy or not is up to you. The important thing is now.
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Tanjirou stands in a snowy
forest.

text: Let’s just look ahead. Let’s try hard together! Let’s fight!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Tanjirou stands in a snowy
forest.

text:
Stop apologizing. You of all people should
understand! I want you to understand how I
feel!
speaker: Nezuko
scene:
In Tanjirou’s subconscious. Tanjirou stands in a snowy
forest.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

text: Was that a dream about the past?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

text:
This is awful.
I can’t believe it ended up like this.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

text:
Were the people
who live here able to escape?
Ah! Where’s Nezuko?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

text:
I have to do what I
can do!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

text: Gyuutarou       What’s this? You’re still alive?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

text:
Gyuutarou       You’re one lucky guy, huh? Well,
not that you have anything
going for you except being lucky.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

text:
Gyuutarou       I
feel sorry for you. Everyone
but you is probably done for.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

text:
A single thrust to that boar’s heart. That towheaded boy’s trapped under the rubble,
and he’s flailing, so I’m just going to leave him there until he dies. Squirming like an insect… How disgraceful is that!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

text:
And how weak was that Hashira! All he had was bluster!
The poison got to him, stopping
his heart, and now he’s dead! It’s all over for him!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

text:
So disgraceful! So disgraceful! You four are truly disgraceful! Especially you! You’re
in another league!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

text:
The one sticking out of
that box you carry is a relative, right?
I can tell that she’s
closely related to you even if she’s a demon now. Is she your older or
younger sister?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

text: Why won’t he kill me? What is this?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

text:
My arm is numb. I still have no strength.
Even if I went for his head now, I
couldn’t slash it.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

text: Gyuutarou       Fu… Fufu… Fufufufu!! Just as I thought! You really are a disgrace! You’re not protecting your little sister at all!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene: In the entertainment district. Tanjirou wakes up with a start.

text:
Gyuutarou       Well, I guess it can’t be helped. Since
you’re a human and your sister’s a demon.

scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

speaker: Nezuko
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text: I want you to head this way!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
The demon scent is getting
stronger.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
Gyuutarou       Who
the hell gets beheaded by those two bottom-feeders?!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
So you were watching
after all! Why didn’t you save me, then?!
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
Gyuutarou       I was battling
a Hashira, you know!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
So what if you were? Why didn’t
you finish him off?! You could’ve just split his head into two!
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text: Gyuutarou       I was about to do that!
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
Gyuutarou       But
that kid with the earrings
was still alive,
so I was going to kill him off first!
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
Since you didn’t do a damn thing yourself,
you could’ve at least finished
off the Hashira!
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text: Then you should’ve controlled me so that I could do that! But you did nothing! You let your guard down!
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text: Gyuutarou       Look, if you’re going to call yourself an Upper Rank…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
Not only that, but they’re
arguing!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text: But it looks like their bodies are starting to disintegrate.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
No one as ugly as you… could possibly
be my brother.
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
I bet you and I… aren’t even related
by blood! We don’t even look anything
alike!
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
You’re so useless!
Your one saving grace is your strength!
Nothing else! You have no
value at all if you lose! You worthless, ugly freak!
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
Gyuutarou       Grr… Don’t
give me that crap! If you
were on your own, you’d be long dead by now!
How many times have I saved you?!
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
You’re the worthless one, and
you know it. You’re weak, and you have no value
whatsoever!
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
I wish I hadn’t
protected someone like you all this time!
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
If it hadn’t been for you, my life would’ve been different! Right,
if it hadn’t been for you!
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
Gyuutarou       Why
do I always have to clean up your messes?
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
Gyuutarou       You
just never should’ve
been born --
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
That’s a lie. You don’t really feel that way at all. You don’t mean any of that.
Try to get along. In this world,
you two siblings
have no one but each other.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
There’s no one who will forgive
you for what you did. You’ll be resented, despised,
and denounced by all those you’ve killed.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
Nobody will ever be on your side. So if nothing
else, you two… shouldn’t be cursing each other out like this!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
Wahhh! Why don’t you shut up?! Don’t you dare lecture
us! You stupid brat!
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text: Get out of here! Just get lost!
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
I’m so pissed!
I’m so pissed! Fix this somehow, Brother! I don’t want to die, Brother!
Brother! Bro --
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

text:
That’s
right. My little
sister’s name was Ume.
(Thoughts) Not Daki. What a god-awful name.
speaker: Daki
scene:
Elsewhere in the ruins of the entertainment district. Nezuko carries Tanjirou on her back as they search for Daki and Gyuutarou’s
heads.

speaker: Man
scene:
In the past, in Gyuutarou’s memory.
A man opens the door to Daki and Gyuutarou’s house and finds
Gyuutarou, who is still a human, sitting next to a dead body.

text:
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts)
No… Ume was pretty bad, too. Since you were named after the disease
that killed our mother.
speaker: Man
scene:
In the past, in Gyuutarou’s memory.
A man opens the door to Daki and Gyuutarou’s house and finds
Gyuutarou, who is still a human, sitting next to a dead body.

text:
The
Rashomon Riverbank. We were born into the lowest class of the Entertainment District. Children were seen as extra mouths to feed, so we were cursed
just for living.
speaker: Man
scene:
In the past, in Gyuutarou’s memory.
A man opens the door to Daki and Gyuutarou’s house and finds
Gyuutarou, who is still a human, sitting next to a dead body.

text:
My mother nearly
killed me more than once before I was ever born.
And she also tried to kill me
numerous times after I was born, since I was nothing but a burden. And yet, I
still survived.
speaker: Man
scene:
In the past, in Gyuutarou’s memory.
A man opens the door to Daki and Gyuutarou’s house and finds
Gyuutarou, who is still a human, sitting next to a dead body.

text:
My body was weak like a withered
leaf, but I clung to life as hard as I could.
speaker: Man
scene:
In the past, in Gyuutarou’s memory.
A man opens the door to Daki and Gyuutarou’s house and finds
Gyuutarou, who is still a human, sitting next to a dead body.

text:
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) Worm! Dimwit! Sad sack! Coward!
Good-for-nothing!
speaker: Man
scene:
In the past, in Gyuutarou’s memory.
A man opens the door to Daki and Gyuutarou’s house and finds
Gyuutarou, who is still a human, sitting next to a dead body.

text:
I was mocked
for my ugly voice and appearance, and rocks were thrown at me for being filthy.
speaker: Man
scene:
In the past, in Gyuutarou’s memory.
A man opens the door to Daki and Gyuutarou’s house and finds
Gyuutarou, who is still a human, sitting next to a dead body.

text:
It was as if all the abuse and insults
in the world were created
just for me.
speaker: Man
scene:
In the past, in Gyuutarou’s memory.
A man opens the door to Daki and Gyuutarou’s house and finds
Gyuutarou, who is still a human, sitting next to a dead body.

text:
Not only was I ugly, but I was filthy,
too. Always covered
in grime and dandruff
from head to toe. Giving off the stench of fleas.
speaker: Man
scene:
In the past, in Gyuutarou’s memory.
A man opens the door to Daki and Gyuutarou’s house and finds
Gyuutarou, who is still a human, sitting next to a dead body.

text:
I was especially despised in the Entertainment District,
where beauty was the
measure of your value. As if I were a monster.
speaker: Man
scene:
In the past, in Gyuutarou’s memory.
A man opens the door to Daki and Gyuutarou’s house and finds
Gyuutarou, who is still a human, sitting next to a dead body.

text:
When
I got hungry, I ate mice and insects. (Thoughts) My only toy was a scythe that a customer
left behind.
speaker: Man
scene:
In the past, in Gyuutarou’s memory.
A man opens the door to Daki and Gyuutarou’s house and finds
Gyuutarou, who is still a human, sitting next to a dead body.

text:
Things
started to change for me… after Ume was born.
speaker: Man
scene:
In the past, in Gyuutarou’s memory.
A man opens the door to Daki and Gyuutarou’s house and finds
Gyuutarou, who is still a human, sitting next to a dead body.

text: Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) Ume… You were my pride and joy.
speaker: Man
scene:
Sometime
later. Daki, who is still a human,
has become a teenager.

text: Even at a tender age, grown-ups would reel at the sight of your beautiful face.
speaker: Man
scene:
Sometime
later. Daki, who is still a human,
has become a teenager.

speaker: Man
scene:
Sometime
later. Daki, who is still a human,
has become a teenager.

text:
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) I discovered that I was good at fighting and started working
as a debt collector.
speaker: Man
scene:
Sometime
later. Daki, who is still a human,
has become a teenager.

text:
I revolted everyone,
and they all feared me. That made me feel so good.
speaker: Man
scene:
Sometime
later. Daki, who is still a human,
has become a teenager.

text:
My ugliness became
a source of pride… and having a gorgeous sister
like you dispelled my sense of inferiority.
speaker: Man
scene:
Sometime
later. Daki, who is still a human,
has become a teenager.

text: I had the feeling that we were on the fast track to a better life.
speaker: Man
scene:
Sometime
later. Daki, who is still a human,
has become a teenager.

text: Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) Until you turned thirteen, Ume.
speaker: Man
scene:
One day, in
the evening. Gyuutarou walks home with a bundle of food.
When he gets home, he finds Daki’s charred body in a hole in
the ground.

speaker: Samurai
scene:
Sometime earlier.
Daki stabs a samurai in the eye with a hairpin.

speaker: Daki
scene:
Sometime earlier.
Daki stabs a samurai in the eye with a hairpin.

speaker: Samurai
scene:
Sometime earlier.
Daki stabs a samurai in the eye with a hairpin.

speaker: Samurai
scene:
Sometime earlier.
Daki stabs a samurai in the eye with a hairpin.

text:
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts)
Because you stabbed a customer, a samurai’s eye with a hairpin, blinding him, you were bound hand and foot
out of retaliation and then burned alive!
speaker: Samurai
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

text: I wasn’t there. I got home from work to find you burnt to a crisp.
speaker: Samurai
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

speaker: Daki
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

text:
Gyuutarou       Ah…
Ahhh!! Stop! Stop!
Stop!
speaker: Daki
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

text:
Don’t collect from me! You’re collecting from me after never giving
me a damn thing?!
speaker: Daki
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

text:
I’ll never forgive you! I’ll never
forgive you!! Turn my sister back to the way she was! Or else… I’ll kill the gods, Buddha,
every one of you!
speaker: Daki
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

speaker: Daki
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

speaker: Samurai
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

speaker: Woman
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

text: I appreciate this! I’m so glad to be rid of that troublemaker!
speaker: Woman
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

text:
He was such a savage, severely
injuring the people
he was collecting from! And lately,
he’s really been out of control!
speaker: Woman
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

text:
It’s a shame that we lost Ume, but when I find another
pretty girl, I’ll send her your way. So, um, about the money…
speaker: Woman
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

text: Hold on. After I finish him off.
speaker: Samurai
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

speaker: Woman
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

speaker: Samurai
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

text:
Gyuutarou       Hey,
you… That’s a fine kimono
you’re wearing, huh?
speaker: Samurai
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

speaker: Samurai
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

text:
Gyuutarou       You’re clean, and you have a good complexion. I bet you always have plenty
to eat and you sleep in a
nice, clean bed.
speaker: Samurai
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

text:
I bet that’s all you’ve ever known. Living
in a house that shelters
you from the rain and wind. Lucky you… Lucky you!
speaker: Samurai
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

text:
A guy who has it so good doesn’t
get to make such a racket. Sniveling
and moaning…
speaker: Samurai
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

speaker: Samurai
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

speaker: Samurai
scene:
In Daki and Gyuutarou’s house. Gyuutarou stands
over Daki’s body.

text:
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) No one would help us. No surprises
there.
speaker: Samurai
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text:
That was just the story of our lives. No one ever offered us a helping
hand.
speaker: Samurai
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text:
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) It started snowing.
We were never shown the slightest mercy, no matter
what the situation.
speaker: Samurai
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

speaker: Samurai
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text: What happened to “fortune and misfortune are intertwined”?! Both fortune and misfortune should come by turns!
speaker: Samurai
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text:
Hey, what’s the matter?
You poor things.
speaker: Douma
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text:
I happen to be kindhearted, so I can’t
look the other way.
That girl is probably going to die any minute now.
speaker: Douma
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text: Ah… I’ll give you some blood! Both of you!
speaker: Douma
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text: If he chooses you, you can become demons.
speaker: Douma
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text:
Life is a sacred
thing. You should treasure it.
speaker: Douma
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text:
Now then… can you become demons…
a Twelve Kizuki
like me… and rise up to the Upper Ranks, I wonder.
speaker: Douma
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text:
Gyuutarou       (Thoughts) I don’t regret
becoming a demon.
speaker: Douma
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text:
No matter
how many times I’m reborn,
I’m going to be a demon every time. I’ll never show mercy to anyone who has a
better life. I’ll always be the Gyuutarou who seizes and collects!
speaker: Douma
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text:
But… if I did have one regret, that would be… Ume… You might’ve turned out
differently than me.
speaker: Douma
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text:
If you’d worked
at a better House, you could’ve become
a respectable oiran… If you’d been born to normal
parents, you could’ve been a normal girl… If
you’d been born into a good family, maybe you would’ve become a well-bred young
lady.
speaker: Douma
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text:
You have such an impressionable, pliant nature. Maybe you only turned out this way because I was the one who
raised you.
speaker: Douma
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text:
“Take before someone
takes from you.”
I taught you to collect from others,
and that’s why you stabbed that samurai in the eye. But if you’d done as he
said, you might’ve followed a different path.
speaker: Douma
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

speaker: Douma
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

speaker: Daki
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

speaker: Daki
scene:
Sometime later.
Gyuutarou carries Daki’s burnt body through the area.

text:
Gyuutarou       What
is this place? Is this Hell?
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

text:
It’s awful
here! I don’t like this
place!
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

text:
Where are we? I want to leave! Do
something!
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

text:
Gyuutarou       Listen. Don’t follow me anymore.
Daki   B-But why? Wait, I -- Gyuutarou       I
said don’t follow me!
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

text: Are you mad about what I said? I’ll apologize, so forgive me!
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

text:
I
don’t think you’re ugly, Brother!
I was just bitter!
I was bitter because
we’d lost! I didn’t
want to admit that we’d lost because of me!
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

text:
I’m sorry!
For not fighting
better! If only I
could’ve been more useful, then we wouldn’t have lost! I’m sorry I’m always
dragging you down!
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

text:
Gyuutarou       You’re not my sister
anymore. You’re nothing
to me.
speaker: Daki
scene: In the present, in a void. Gyuutarou finds himself alone.

text:
I’m heading this way, so you go in the opposite
direction, toward the light.

text:
Kokushibou     It’s not for your benefit that I speak.
Disrupting the hierarchy… which, in turn, undermines
subordination, is what dismays me.
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text: Oh, is that right? I see.
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
Kokushibou     Akaza…
If you are disgruntled, you should battle for a replacement.
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
Well, well!
If I may, Lord Kokushibou, even if he were to challenge us, Lord Akaza
could never defeat us.
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
And in my case, since I became a demon after Lord Akaza yet was promoted before him,
I’d be angry, too, if I were in his shoes. Don’t be so hard on him!
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
And besides,
I didn’t dodge that blow on purpose.
It’s just a little harmless
horseplay! This is how you
nurture friendship, you know.
speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

text:
Those of us on top shouldn’t
give our subordinates a hard time. Don’t you think --

scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

speaker: Douma
scene:
In the Infinity Castle.
Nakime summons the Upper Ranks before her. Gyokko jumps in his pot.

speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

Sorry about this. Looks
like my wife’s fast asleep,

scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

text:
I really must apologize, making our guest
babysit like this.
speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

text:
No need to apologize. She must be exhausted. It’s a lot of hard work,
giving birth and raising a child.
speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

text: I’ll be leaving after I’ve had this.
speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

text: It wouldn’t be right to keep eating for free here.
speaker: Yoriichi

In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings

text:
Sumiyoshi       Ah, don’t
say that! You saved our lives! If it hadn’t
been for you, not only would we be
dead, but this child wouldn’t have been born, either.
speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

text:

well. Then the least I can do is pass down your name to
posterity.
speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

text:
Sumiyoshi       But didn’t you say you were at
a loss because you have no heirs? Even if a humble charcoal seller like myself can’t
do it, I’m sure that one day somebody will.
speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings

text:

speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

text:
Even if it’s
a new era, even if you must take a different path to get there, you’ll
always find your way back to
the same place.
speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

text:
You seem to perceive
me as some kind of special person,
but you’re wrong about that.
speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

text:
I failed
to protect anything
that was important to me, and throughout my life, I was unable to do what I was supposed to do.
speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

text:
My name is as worthless
as I am.
speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

text:
Sumiyoshi       Ahh… Please
don’t… Please don’t say something like that… Please,
I’m begging you! Don’t think of yourself like that!
speaker: Yoriichi
scene:
In the past. Yoriichi
sits on the veranda with Sumiyoshi’s baby. Sumiyoshi brings
tea and food.

text:
My name is Gotou. I’m a member
of the Demon Slayer Corps Cleanup Crew, a Kakushi.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
During
the Hashira Meeting,
someone said to Tanjirou Kamado,
“Are you going to sleep all
day? Wake the hell up, will you?” That was me.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: It seems fate tends to draw us together.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text: I was also the one who found him and his friends two months ago in the Entertainment District.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
Since I found them like this, I thought, “They’re
pretty close!” Or so I thought,
until I saw that all three of them were critically wounded and comatose.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

text:
They’re
younger than me, and they became swordsmen who risked their lives
in battle, so I respect them wholeheartedly.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

deal?

Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

a tray of castella.

Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

But this is a gift for him since he’s still unconscious.
(Narration) They say he’s got a great sense of smell, so maybe…

Elsewhere in the Butterfly
Mansion. Gotou carries
a tray of castella.

a tray of castella.

If it seems like it’s about to go bad, you can have it.

brother. I wonder
if they’re on bad terms. That’s just heart- wrenching.

in my family, and we all get along, so it’s hard for me to fathom. I thought, “Those Shinazugawa
brothers are scary!”

scene:
Later that night. Tanjirou
and Kanroji sit down for dinner.

Genya still hasn’t shown up. I was hoping
we could at least have a talk.

and Kanroji sit down for dinner.

I wonder if he brought something

Don’t tell anyone, okay?

what should I do? You want to hear? Well,

on the mountainside here. And the fish was caught fresh from the river this morning.

found Mr. Haganezuka. Until
then, please build back your stamina and get some rest.

… I know I have to rest up,

the one Ms. Kanroji told me about.
Wanna come with me?

text:

text:

pleasure to meet you! My name is Gyokko. Before
I kill you, might I
ask for a minute of your time?

speaker: Tokitou

guests tonight!

intentionally pushed them to the forefront!

Mr. Hagaike! Koutarou!

Moreover, I’ve truly brought
out their swordsmith qualities by piercing
them with swords! I left these hyottoko masks on to
juxtapose emptiness and absurdity. Needless to say, this, too, was a deliberate
choice! And this is the best part!
speaker: Gyokko

It can teleport
from one vase to another.
I see.

What I especially take pride in is the vase’s
--

gall, slashing it! My vase! My art! You have no eye for beauty, you damn ape!

you lack the ability to appreciate my artwork! Which, in a way,
is fine!

indeed!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
How do you like
it? The poison must slowly be numbing your limbs, right? So very comical! You saved some worthless
lives, and now you’re going to die in a worthless
place. So worthless, it doesn’t matter whether they exist or not.
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

I think someone
said the same thing to me years
ago. Who was it?
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
It was summer.
It was hot. We’d left the door open.
I guess because
it was too hot, the cicadas
were buzzing really loud.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
Hyo, hyo! Still, you are a Hashira, even looking like that. What kind of artwork should
I produce? Oh, I’m giddy!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text: Shut up. It’s all your talk that’s worthless.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

Blood Demon Art, Water
Prison Pot!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
Death by suffocation is rather stylish.
Beautiful! And that chilling feeling
of a blade pressed against your neck… Now that’s simply sublime!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
It’s no good. I can’t
slash it.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
I just stopped a Demon Slayer’s
greatest weapon, his breathing. I can barely
contain myself, just imagining your face twisted in agony! Hyo, hyo!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

text:
Obliterating
this village will be a devastating blow to you Demon Slayers. Once we’ve
brought the Demon Slayers to their knees,
even Ubuyashiki’s head will be within reach! Hyo, hyo!
speaker: Gyokko
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Gyokko approaches Tokitou,
Kanamori, and Kotetsu.

blood! (Thoughts) The sword’s changing color!

scene:

Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
The temperature’s rising,
and my black sword is turning red! Enveloped in exploding blood! This is…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

A samurai’s sword turns red only during
battle, right?

scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
Why is that? So mysterious! Even though normally,
it’s pitch-black like obsidian…
speaker: Suyako
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

speaker: Suyako
scene:

Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text: Oh, right. This is an inherited memory.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
The samurai she’s talking about…
Could it be that swordsman with the earrings?
Was that swordsman’s sword pitch-black?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
I’ve got
a black sword just like his. And my own sword just turned red, too! It changed color!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
This
sword turned red thanks to the power of Nezuko’s blood, so even if it was through
a different method
than that swordsman’s, right now, my sword is just
like his.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
You may think
you’ve gotten stronger, but there are always even more
powerful demons.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
I’m only flesh and blood,
so my body is scarred
and battered, but… every
time, someone comes to my aid! They keep me alive!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
I have to meet their
expectations!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
Everyone
who’s helped me out has just one wish, just one desire!
To defeat the demons! To
protect human lives!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

speaker: Karaku
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

speaker: Sekido
scene:

text:
I have to come through
for them!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
Fufu… Even if you resort to cheap tricks,
you can’t beat me.
speaker: Karaku
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text: You can slash me, but I won’t feel a thing!
speaker: Urogi
scene:

Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
A burning blade… Raging Sword…
Lord Muzan’s memories… The sword of a swordsman who drove Lord Muzan into
a corner… and nearly beheaded him!
speaker: Sekido
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text: I see that swordsman in him.
speaker: Sekido
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

scene:

text:
I’ve been thinking
about that one blow all this time… The reason
why I was able to cut off Gyuutarou’s head with that blow.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Elsewhere in the village.
Tanjirou tries to take his sword away from Nezuko.

text:
How I felt in that moment, my breathing, the way I exerted myself…
The way my whole body felt
like it was on fire, and my forehead!
speaker: Tanjirou

Big Brother…
speaker: Genya
scene:

text:
I wanted to become a Hashira so my big brother would acknowledge me. And… I also wanted to apologize… for
what I said that day!
speaker: Genya
scene:
Near the ruined building. Nezuko tries to get Aizetsu’s
spear out of her stomach.

text:
My mom was such a tiny person.
I grew taller than her at an early age.
speaker: Genya
scene:
Near the ruined building. Nezuko tries to get Aizetsu’s
spear out of her stomach.

text:
My mother was always working,
from morning until
night. Not once did I see
her sleeping.
speaker: Genya
scene:
Near the ruined building. Nezuko tries to get Aizetsu’s
spear out of her stomach.

text:
My father was not only a big guy,
but he was also a good-for-nothing.
He got stabbed to death by someone
with a grudge, which served him right. The old man was always beating up my
mother and us kids.
speaker: Genya
scene:
Near the ruined building. Nezuko tries to get Aizetsu’s
spear out of her stomach.

text:
With that tiny body of hers, our mother would shield us from our monstrous
father without so much as flinching. I think she was amazing.
speaker: Genya
scene:
Near the ruined building. Nezuko tries to get Aizetsu’s
spear out of her stomach.

into a demon.

outside where day was starting
to break. When you first realized
it was Mom who’d attacked
our family… how did it make you feel,
Big Brother?
speaker: Genya
scene:

text:

brother you’d fought tooth and nail to protect denounced you, how did that make you
feel?

each other to protect the family together…

that tiny demon’s
neck… the Anger Demon raised
both hands!
speaker: Genya

In the forests
around the Swordsmith Village. Tanjirou’s sword cuts into Hantengu’s neck.

text:
And in the blink of an eye, he drew in the Joy Demon and the Pleasure Demon! He pulverized their
flesh, then absorbed both demons!

In the forests

in another instant,
the Anger Demon moved toward
Aizetsu!

In the forests

In the forests

Just now, you tried to slash a small, weak being who could fit in the palm of
your hand.

In the forests
around the Swordsmith Village. Tanjirou’s sword cuts into Hantengu’s neck.

In the forests

In the forests
around the Swordsmith Village. Tanjirou’s sword cuts into Hantengu’s neck.

In the forests

How very sublime

swordsman who used something called “First Breathing” no less!

text:
Someone who can’t even cook rice on his own becoming
a swordsman?! Save others?!
Give me a break, will you?!
speaker: Tokitou

text:
Seriously, you’re

text:
Just like Mother, who worked without
telling us she was unwell

text:
After all… After all I did to try to stop him! After
I begged Mother
to rest over and over! You know who can help others? Only
the chosen ones!
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Sometime later. Tokitou gushes about Amane’s
visit as Yuuichiou

text: Our ancestors may have been swordsmen, but what can kids like us to?!
speaker: Tokitou
scene:

visit as Yuuichiou
prepares dinner.

text:
Want me to tell you what it
is we can do? What you and I
can do is die like dogs and die
in vain! Because we’re Father and Mother’s children!
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
Sometime later. Tokitou gushes about Amane’s
visit as Yuuichiou
prepares dinner.

text:
We’re only going to be used by that woman!
There’s no way she’s not plotting something! We’re never gonna talk about
this again! Got that?! Now hurry up and get dinner ready!
speaker: Tokitou
scene:

to each other.

going to pretend to be someone I’m not?

text: This isn’t right. It can’t be right!

day… It all started one thousand years ago. The era was still called Heian
back then.
speaker: Kibutsuji
scene:
In Kibutsuji’s past. A doctor
calls for Kibutsuji, who is still a human.

text:
If I may, sir… Your medicine
is ready for you now.

In Kibutsuji’s past. A doctor
calls for Kibutsuji, who is still a human.

speaker: Doctor

text:

is the only one I have to lean on.
speaker: Doctor
scene:
In Kibutsuji’s past. A doctor
calls for Kibutsuji, who is still a human.

text: H.Kibutsuji        What will become of me if I don’t take this?
speaker: Doctor
scene:
In a darkened room. The doctor gives Kibutsuji
some medicine.

text:
As you know,
you will not live to see your twentieth birthday. I am doing all I can to help you live even a little longer.
speaker: Doctor
scene:
In a darkened room. The doctor gives Kibutsuji
some medicine.

text:

right, fine. That’s
enough.
speaker: Doctor
scene:
In a darkened room. The doctor gives Kibutsuji
some medicine.

speaker: Doctor
scene:

text:

them! Every living
being!
speaker: Doctor
scene:
Sometime later.
Kibutsuji lies in bed.

text:
No matter
how many times he examines
me or administers that medicine, nothing can stop my symptoms
from worsening.
speaker: Doctor
scene:
Sometime later.
Kibutsuji lies in bed.

text: H.Kibutsuji        Death is all you deserve, you damn incompetent doctor!
speaker: Doctor
scene:
Sometime later.
Kibutsuji lies in bed.

text:
But then I realized that this doctor’s
medicine was working
not long after I’d
killed him.
speaker: Kibutsuji
scene:
Sometime later.
Kibutsuji lies in bed.

text:
My body was bursting with energy, and I thought
that I’d gained
a durable physique, but there
was a problem.
speaker: Kibutsuji
scene:
Sometime later.
Kibutsuji lies in bed.

text: I couldn’t walk in the sunlight.
speaker: Kibutsuji
scene:
Sometime later.
Kibutsuji lies in bed.

text: I could tell that if exposed to sunlight, I would die.
speaker: Kibutsuji
scene:
Sometime later.
Kibutsuji lies in bed.

text:
I began to crave human flesh and blood.
To remedy that, all I had to do was devour humans.
speaker: Kibutsuji
scene:
Sometime later.
Kibutsuji lies in bed.

text:
If anyone stands
in your way, just eliminate
them. That’s all there is to it.
speaker: Kibutsuji
scene:
Sometime later.
Kibutsuji lies in bed.

text: Come back here, cursed demon who disrupts the peace of the capitol!
speaker: Soldier

On a dark and stormy night. Soldiers
confront Kibutsuji as he roams the streets.

power. Eternal power!

On a dark and stormy night. Soldiers
confront Kibutsuji as he roams the streets.

text:
But… having to restrict my movements during
the day was humiliating, and my anger only grew. I began to seek a
body that wouldn’t perish in the sunlight.
speaker: Kibutsuji
scene:
On a dark and stormy night. Soldiers
confront Kibutsuji as he roams the streets.

text:
I examined the compounds for the doctor’s
elixir, but perhaps
because it was still in the experimental stages, I
couldn’t figure out how to make the medicine called “Blue Spider Lily”.
speaker: Kibutsuji
scene:
On a dark and stormy night. Soldiers
confront Kibutsuji as he roams the streets.

text:
It did seem to contain actual
blue-colored spider lilies,
but as for where this Blue Spider Lily bloomed or whether or not it could be cultivated,
no one knew but the doctor I’d
killed. I searched all over Japan but failed to find it.
speaker: Kibutsuji
scene:
On a dark and stormy night. Soldiers
confront Kibutsuji as he roams the streets.

text:
In order to become
truly immortal, finding
the Blue Spider
Lily and someone who had the ability to survive
the sunlight have been my top priorities.
speaker: Kibutsuji
scene:
On a dark and stormy night. Soldiers
confront Kibutsuji as he roams the streets.

text:
And at last, I’ve found
her!
speaker: Kibutsuji

carrying Tanjirou after his fight with Hantengu.

Since that girl has conquered
the sun, there’s
no longer any reason to increase my kind. I will absorb her,
and then I will conquer the sunlight!

speaker: Tanjirou

At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown

text:
Well, that’s
because the Master
and his family’s predictions are incredible. Anyway, you’ve been unconscious for a
week. Is it okay to eat that much?
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown
of events.

text:
Yes!
Kanroji said she also eats a lot! Gotou     Nah, she seems a bit beyond
reason. Kanroji   (Flashback)
Mmm… Delicious!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown
of events.

text:
Is it true that the Love Hashira and Mist Hashira
slept for two days and were almost fully recovered by the third day?
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown
of events.

speaker: Kanroji
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown
of events.

text:
You’re getting
closer to them, you know? Bit by bit.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown
of events.

text: Well, it’s fine if you get better soon.
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown
of events.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown

speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown

text:
Oh, this is what I wanted
to ask the most. I heard
your sister has become something incredible. Is she all right?
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown
of events.

text:
Oh, yes, she is. She’s starting
to totter under the sun.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown
of events.

text: Isn’t that bad? Seriously, isn’t that dangerous?
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown
of events.

text:
She’s being examined, but we still
don’t know anything.
We don’t know if she’s turning
back into a human or evolving as a demon.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown
of events.

text:
Is Lady Kochou looking
into it?
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown
of events.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown
of events.

speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown
of events.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown
of events.

speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown

text: Tsk… Hey, see? You ate too much! You should know that you’re still recovering!
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown
of events.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown
of events.

text:
Your sister has become
like that and things are going to start happening. Every Corps member has
been given an order to be on alert, and we’re told the Hashira are gathering.
What happens from now, really?
speaker: Gotou
scene:
At the Butterfly Mansion. Tanjirou sits in bed and eats while Gotou gives him a rundown
of events.

text:
Shinazugawa    We’re
the last ones, huh?
speaker: Gotou
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

speaker: Iguro
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text: No problem. Well done on your mission.
speaker: Himejima
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

speaker: Himejima
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text: I heard Kanroji and Tokitou had a fight against the Upper Ranks.
speaker: Himejima
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
Yeah. They were strong!
I felt like I couldn’t
do it anymore, but we all pulled
together.
speaker: Kanroji
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

speaker: Kanroji
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

speaker: Tokitou
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
Shinazugawa    Ugh…
That makes me jealous. Why haven’t I encountered an Upper Rank?
speaker: Tokitou
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
It’s like almost everyone
is running into them. Kanroji
and Tokitou, how are you feeling now?
speaker: Iguro
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
Oh!
Thanks for asking. I’m much better now! (Thoughts) Oh, my! He’s worried about me! Ahh~! Haha! Hahaha!
speaker: Kanroji
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
I’m fine, too, although
I’m still not in my best form.
speaker: Tokitou
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
If we lose any more Hashira,
the Corps will be in danger. Defeating
two Upper Ranks without dying is a tremendous feat.
speaker: Himejima
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
You two healed unusually
fast this time. What happened?
speaker: Shinobu
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
I believe the Master
will talk about
that matter, too.
speaker: Tomioka
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
Thank you for waiting.
At today’s Hashira
meeting, I, Amane Ubuyashiki, will represent
Kagaya Ubuyashiki.
speaker: Amane
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
I would also like to apologize sincerely
for the fact that Master
Kagaya will no longer be able to appear before you due to his
declining health.
speaker: Amane
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

speaker: Hashira
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

speaker: Hashira
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
Understood. I pray
that his flame of life continues to burn even one day longer. I also
pray that your spirit remains strong, Amane.
speaker: Himejima
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text: My sincere gratitude to all the Hashira.
speaker: Amane
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
As you may have already heard,
now that a demon who can withstand
the sunlight has appeared, Muzan Kibutsuji will change
his aim and come for her so that he can overcome the sun, too.
speaker: Amane
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
A large-scale war is near. I
have received reports that during
the fight against
Upper Rank Four and Five, Kanroji…
speaker: Amane
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

speaker: Kanroji
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

speaker: Amane
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

speaker: Tokitou
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
… manifested a unique
pattern of marks.
speaker: Amane
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

speaker: Crow
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
I would like you both to tell us about what conditions caused
those marks to appear.
speaker: Amane
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

speaker: Crow
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

speaker: Crow
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

speaker: Kanroji
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
During
the Sengoku period, there were swordsmen of the First Breathing who had almost defeated
Muzan Kibutsuji. All of them manifested marks similar to a demon crest.
speaker: Amane
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

speaker: Amane
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

speaker: Amane
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text: You may have heard such tales, but the tales are true.
speaker: Amane
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text: Shinazugawa    This is the first I’ve heard of it. Why was it kept in the dark?
speaker: Amane
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
Many people
have tormented themselves over the marks
that did not manifest. That is
because there is a lack of clarity regarding the legend of the marks.
speaker: Amane
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
It could be because
it was not considered important at the time,
or perhaps, because
the Demon Slayer Corps has been nearly destroyed many times, the
information was not passed down. Only one thing was written down clearly.
speaker: Amane
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
When the marked one appears, the mark will appear on others around
as well as if in resonance.
speaker: Amane
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text: That was written down in the journal of the swordsman of the First Breathing.
speaker: Kiriya
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
The first
person in this generation who did manifest
the mark… was not a Hashira but Tanjirou Kamado. He was the first
marked one.
speaker: Amane
scene: At the Ubuyashiki residence. The Hashira have gathered.

text:
It was like “gwaaah”! And then “gaaah!”
My stomach was like “groooar”! Like that!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In a courtyard. Tanjirou
explains the feeling
of the mark manifesting to a kasugai
crow.

text:
However,
he did not seem to know how the mark manifested, so we put it aside for the time being. And this time, following
him, two Hashira have had this awakening.
speaker: Amane
scene:
In a courtyard. Tanjirou
explains the feeling
of the mark manifesting to a kasugai
crow.

text:
Please teach us how to manifest
it, Kanroji and Tokitou.
speaker: Amane
scene:
In a courtyard. Tanjirou
explains the feeling
of the mark manifesting to a kasugai
crow.

speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In a courtyard. Tanjirou
explains the feeling
of the mark manifesting to a kasugai
crow.

text: Lady Amane is so admirable! Mmm~!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In a courtyard. Tanjirou
explains the feeling
of the mark manifesting to a kasugai
crow.

text:
Ah! Uh, well,
so at that time… if I remember
right, my body became very light.
Um… Uh… And then… it was… Ah!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In a courtyard. Tanjirou
explains the feeling
of the mark manifesting to a kasugai
crow.

text:
It was like “gwaaah”! And “whooom”! Then “gaaah”! My heart was thumping nonstop!
My ears rang so loudly! Crack, crack, crack! Like that!
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In a courtyard. Tanjirou
explains the feeling
of the mark manifesting to a kasugai
crow.

speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In a courtyard. Tanjirou
explains the feeling
of the mark manifesting to a kasugai

In a courtyard. Tanjirou
explains the feeling
of the mark manifesting to a kasugai

text: My deepest apologies. I would crawl into a hole if there was one!

scene:
In a courtyard. Tanjirou
explains the feeling
of the mark manifesting to a kasugai

speaker: Tokitou

In a courtyard. Tanjirou
explains the feeling

text:
I
wasn’t aware of any mark that manifested on me, but when I think back to that battle, there are a few unusual
things that come to mind. If the conditions are met, everyone could probably
manifest the mark.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
In a courtyard. Tanjirou
explains the feeling
of the mark manifesting to a kasugai
crow.

text:
I’ll tell you how I
did it.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
In a courtyard. Tanjirou
explains the feeling
of the mark manifesting to a kasugai
crow.

text:
During that battle, I was poisoned
and couldn’t move.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

text:
When I tried to slow down my blood circulation and the spread of the poison using my
breathing, I saw the boy who wanted to save me nearly killed, my lost memories
returned, and then I couldn’t control my emotions because I was so angry. I
think my heart rate was over 200 beats per minute.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

text:
Furthermore, my body was burning hot. My temperature must have reached
over 39 degrees Celsius.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

text: Ah… How could you move in such a state? It could be life-threatening.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

text: You’re right. It was like being sieved.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

text:
I think the difference between those who manifest the mark and those who don’t
is whether you die or not.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

text:
A heart rate over 200 beats per minute…
How can you be sure your temperature was 39 degrees?
speaker: Amane
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

text:
Well,
I had a fever when I was being treated at Kochou’s place. The thermometer
showed my body temperature was 39 degrees.
I felt it was the same heat when the mark
manifested.
speaker: Tokitou
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

text: Shinazugawa    Tsk… So it’s really that simple.
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

text: I envy you for being such a simpleton that you can call that simple.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains

speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

text:
That means we Hashira
must manifest the mark.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

text:
Agreed. We will do something about
it. Please tell the Master
to rest assured.
speaker: Himejima
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

text:
Thank you. But there is one thing I must tell you regarding
the training to manifest the mark.
speaker: Amane
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

speaker: Kanroji
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

text: Those who have manifested the mark will have no choice anymore.
speaker: Amane
scene:
In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains
his circumstances.

speaker: Amane

In the Ubuyashiki residence. Tokitou explains

I understand now. But in that case, what would happen
to me? Good Lord.
speaker: Himejima
scene:
Sometime later.
The rain has stopped. Amane,
Nichika, and Kiriya
have left the room.

text:
Since Lady Amane has left, I have nothing
left to do
here.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime later.
The rain has stopped. Amane,
Nichika, and Kiriya
have left the room.

text:
Shinazugawa    Hey,
hold on! Don’t just leave! We have to decide
what each of us is going to do.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime later.
The rain has stopped. Amane,
Nichika, and Kiriya
have left the room.

text:
The six of you can talk among yourselves. It has nothing
to do with me.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime later.
The rain has stopped. Amane,
Nichika, and Kiriya
have left the room.

text:
What do you mean by that?
You’re not aware enough that you’re a Hashira.
speaker: Iguro
scene:
Sometime later.
The rain has stopped. Amane,
Nichika, and Kiriya
have left the room.

text: Or what? Do you want to start your training as soon as possible? You want to skip the meeting?
speaker: Iguro
scene:
Sometime later.
The rain has stopped. Amane,
Nichika, and Kiriya
have left the room.

speaker: Kanroji
scene:

The rain has stopped. Amane,

have left the room.

have left the room.

text:
Explain yourself, Tomioka. You didn’t explain
enough.
speaker: Shinobu
scene:
Sometime later.
The rain has stopped. Amane,
Nichika, and Kiriya
have left the room.

text: I’m different from all of you.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime later.
The rain has stopped. Amane,
Nichika, and Kiriya
have left the room.

text:
Shinazugawa    I don’t like it. You said the same thing
before, Tomioka. Are you looking
down on us?
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime later.
The rain has stopped. Amane,
Nichika, and Kiriya
have left the room.

text:
P-Please, don’t
fight! Stay calm,
okay?
speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.
The rain has stopped. Amane,
Nichika, and Kiriya
have left the room.

speaker: Kanroji
scene:
Sometime later.

have left the room.

The rain has stopped. Amane,

have left the room.

text: Let’s continue our discussion. I have a proposal.
speaker: Himejima

The rain has stopped. Amane,

have left the room.

There’s no member in critical condition, so they’ve been playing with Nezuko. Thanks

decreased significantly. If that is
the case, since we could hardly train others other than our Tsuguko
due to our schedules until now, in this short period of time, we should use
this opportunity to strengthen the
entire Corps.

text:
After my training… first
is Tokitou’s high-speed movement training. He’ll
do harsh things even with his poker face. Next,
they’ll be greeted by Kanroji’s hellish flexibility training.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the mountains. The Hashira training
begins. Several Demon
Slayers run up the mountain.

text:
Next comes Iguro’s
training to improve
swordsmanship. I tell you the Serpent Hashira
is stubborn. After is Shinazugawa’s training.
I heard it’s endless striking
training, which, as I’m sure the name implies, will have no
end.
speaker: Uzui
scene:
In the mountains. The Hashira training
begins. Several Demon
Slayers run up the mountain.

text: The last one is Himejima’s muscle strengthening. You have to throw away your humanity for this one.
speaker: Uzui

begins. Several Demon
Slayers run up the mountain.

text:

another.

text: I… never passed the Final Selection.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime later,
in the mountains. Tanjirou continues to follow Tomioka.

text:
What? Final Selection? You mean the trail on the mountain
with wisteria flowers?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
Sometime later,
in the mountains. Tanjirou continues to follow Tomioka.

text:
That’s right.
That year, along
with a boy whose family had also been killed
by demons, a boy with peach-colored hair named
Sabito, I took part in the Selection.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
Sometime later,
in the mountains. Tanjirou continues to follow Tomioka.

speaker: Tanjirou

In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
I was 13. We were the same age and all alone in the world.
We became fast friends.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Sabito had a strong
sense of justice…
and he had a kind and gentle
heart.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

speaker: Tomioka

text:
Tomioka          The only one who died during
that year’s Selection… was Sabito.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
He’d killed every demon on that mountain almost
single-handedly.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

speaker: Demons
scene:

Everyone but Sabito passed
that Final Seleciton.

scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text: I was… wounded by the first demon that attacked me and was in a daze.

In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
At that moment… it was Sabito who
saved me, too. Sabito     (Flashback) Water Breathing, Fourth Form… Striking
Tide! Demon       (Flashback)
Ahh!
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text: Leaving me in the care of another boy, Sabito ran off toward the voice pleading for help.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text: When I came to, the Final Selection was over.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
It’s true that
I’d survived for seven days and passed the Selection, but as I’d failed to
defeat a single demon and had only been saved by another,
could you really
say that I’d passed?
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text: I’m not worthy of being the Water Hashira.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
And for that matter,
I’m not even worthy of standing as an equal with the other Hashira. I’m not like them. Normally,
there’d be no place for me in the Demon Slayer Corps.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Have the Hashira
train you. That would be best.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
I’ll never manifest a mark. Though it might
have happened for Sabito.
Just forget about me from now on. You’re only wasting your time.
speaker: Tomioka
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
I’ll bet that Mr. Giyuu
thinks he should’ve been the one to die.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
I
know all too well how that feels. When someone close to you that you wish had outlived
you… ends up dying before
you instead, and worse, dies protecting you… it
leaves you feeling gutted with pain.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Sabito,
the boy who trained me on Mt. Sagiri… That was such a strange experience. They were both already
long dead, but they helped me.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
I see. So, Sabito went through the Final Selection
with Mr. Giyuu? (Thoughts) If he’d lived, he
would’ve been the same age as Mr. Giyuu.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
That’s
amazing… So amazing.
He saved everyone
during the Selection. (Thoughts) It’s something I
couldn’t do. It was all I could do to protect myself.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
If Sabito
were alive now, he would’ve
become such an incredible swordsman.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
That must be part of the reason
why Mr. Giyuu feels he should’ve been the
one to die.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
I get that.
I had that same thought
myself.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Mr. Rengoku… risked
his own life to protect
us. He was an incredible man. (Thoughts) He was kinder than anyone else and stronger.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
What
an amazing way to live… right up to the end. (Thoughts) I wished I’d been the one to die instead
of Mr. Rengoku.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
I thought
Mr. Rengoku might’ve
been the one to kill Muzan one day. But…

In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text: He said he believes in you, so just think about how you’re going to measure up to that!

In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou

Absolutely! But what should
I say to Mr. Giyuu?
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
No
matter how pathetic and embarrassed you may feel, you’ve got to go on living.
Though he refuses to acknowledge it himself, I can imagine how hard he must’ve
driven himself, whipped
himself into shape
to become a Hashira. Just how much suffering
he must’ve gone through…
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
It’s not my place to criticize Mr. Giyuu when I know nothing about
him. But… But there’s one
thing that I just have to ask him.
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Ugh, he won’t stop for
me!
speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Mr. Giyuu… Mr. Giyuu… Aren’t you going to pass on what Sabito
entrusted to you?

scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

speaker: Tanjirou
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Don’t
ever say you should’ve died again!
speaker: Sabito
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Next time you say it, you and I are through! I won’t be your friend
anymore!
speaker: Sabito
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Your big sister,
who was supposed to be married the next
day, knew what was going to happen when she hid you from the demons to
protect you! You, of all people, shouldn’t be insulting your sister’s memory!
speaker: Sabito
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

text:
Don’t you dare die, no matter what! The life that your sister saved for you by
sacrificing her own… the future that she entrusted to you… You have to pass
those on, too, Giyuu!
speaker: Sabito
scene:
In the mountains. Tanjirou
processes Tomioka’s words.

back to me now so vividly.

processes Tomioka’s words.

helpless.

processes Tomioka’s words.

Sabito… Sorry that I’m so immature.

Since

but he wouldn’t have to talk during a speed eating contest! What a
brilliant idea!

like I reminded you about something sad.

text: By using repetitive motion, you can increase your concentration to the max anytime!
speaker: Tanjirou

text:
My repetitive motion is… to first picture
the faces of my loved ones.
(Thoughts) And also… to recall Mr. Rengoku’s words.
